Gubhaabhushiyenje, “Mmwe ni bhakwiya bhala, eu twaalindile bhana?”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “Nnjendangane nkaalugulilanje a Yowana indu inkwipilikananga na inkwibhonanga,
ashinangalole bhanalolanga na ashinangwabha bhanakwendanga na bhakwetenje mangundula bhanalamanga na ashinangapilikane bhanapilikananga na bhawilenje bhanayukanga na bhaalaga bhanalungushiwanga Ngani ja Mmbone.
Mbaya mundu jojowe akalebha kwa ligongo lya leka ngulupalila nne.”
Bhai, bhantenga bha a Yowana bhala bhalijabhulanga, a Yeshu gubhatandwibhe kwaabhalanjilanga makundi ga bhandu ngani ja a Yowana, “Mwashinkwendangana kuanga kulola nndi? Kulola litete lilitikinywa na mbungo?
Igala, mwapitengeneje kulola nndi? Mundu awete nngubho ya konja? Bhandu bhaawalanga nngubho ya konja mwaakutamanga nnyumba ya ashimpalume bha shilambo.
Ikabheje, mwapiteneje lolanga nndi? Nkulondola jwa a Nnungu? Elo, ngunakummalanjilanga, mumweninji nkulungwa kupunda nkulondola jwa a Nnungu.
“A Yowana ni bhantenga bhalugwilwe Mmajandiko ga Ukonjelo, ‘Nnole, ngunakuntuma muntenga jwangu annongolele, ashanng'alashiye mpanda gwenu.’
Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, akanabhe koposhela jwa nnibhondo ali jwankulungwa kwaapunda a Yowana bhabhatisha. Ikabheje, jwene ali jwanshoko Muupalume gwa Kunnungu, ni jwankulungwa kwaapunda bhenebho.
Tandubhila mobha ga a Yowana bhabhatisha mpaka nnaino, Upalume gwa Kunnungu gunakomanilwa na bhandunji bhanalinganga kuutola kwa mashili na bhakwetenje mashili bhanakuutolanga.
Pabha ashinkulondola bha a Nnungu bhowe na Shalia, mpaka mobha ga a Yowana, bhashinkulondolanga ga gene mobha gano.
Bhai, monaga shinkundanje, a Yowanabho ni a Eliya bhapinjikwaga bhaishe.
Akwete makutujo apilikane.
“Bhai, nandanye na nndi alu lubhelekolu? Malinga bhashanda bhatemingenenje kushoko, bhali kwaabhalanjilanga ashaajabhonji bhalinkutinji,
‘Twanngombelenje imbeta, ikabheje mwangainanga! Twajimbile nyimbo ya ililo, ikabheje mwangagutanga!’
Pabha a Yowana bhaishe, bhakaalya wala papila, gubhashitenje, ‘Bhashikola lioka.’
Mwana juka Mundu gwaishe, alilya na papila, gubhashitenje, ‘Mwaalolanje bhaakongolela kulya na kolelwa, ashaambwiga ajabho bhakamula koli na bhakwetenje yambi!’ Nkali nneyo lunda lwa a Nnungu lumanyishe kuti lwammbone kwa itendi yakwe.”
Kungai a Yeshu gubhatandwibhe kwaagambanga bhandunji bha mwiilambo mubhatendile ilapo ya igwinji, pabha bhandu bhakwe bhangapinganga kwiipeta.
“Ole gwenunji bhandu bha ku Kolashini! Ole gwenunji bhandu bha ku Bhetishaida! Pabha, ilapo itendeshe kungwenunji monaga ikatendeshe ku Tilo na ku Shidoni, bhandu bhabhonji bhakaipetilenje kwa wala maguniya na pakala liu kuti bhaleshilenje yambi.
Ikabheje, ngunakummalanjilanga, lyubha lya ukumu mmanganya nkupinga patanga mboteko ya punda ya bhandunji bha ku Tilo na ku Shidoni.
Na mmanganyanji bhandu bha ku Kapalanaumu, bhuli, shinkuywanje mpaka kunnungu? Nkupinga tuluywanga mpaka kundamo ja bhawilenje! Pabha, ilapo itendeshe kungwwenunji monaga ikatendeshe kubhandu bha ku Shodoma, shene shilambosho shikaapali mpaka lelo.
Ikabheje ngunakummalanjilanga, lyubha lya ukumu mmanganyanji nkupinga patanga mboteko ya punda ya bhandu ku Shodoma.”
Gene malangago a Yeshu gubhashite, “Ngunatenda eja kwenu mmwe Atati, Mmakulungwa bha kunnungu na pa shilambolyo, pabha yene indui nshikwaiyanga bhakwetenje lunda na bhaashomanga, nikwaunukulilanga bhana bhashoko bhashoko.
Elo Atati, pabha shiishite kunnonyela mmayene.”
Gubhaabhalanjilenje bhandunji, “Atati bhashingamuya indu yowe. Jwakwapi akummanya mwana ikabhe Atati, wala akwaamanya Atati ikabhe Mwana, na jojowe apingaga Mwana kung'unukulila.
“Nnjiyangananje mmowe nkuabhukanga na topelwa na mishigo, nne shinimpumuliyanje.
Nkundanje kulongoywa na nne malinga ng'ombe atabhilwa lingongota, nkupinga mwiijiganyanje kwangu nne. Pabha nne najwakwiitimalika na najwashinunu, numbe mmanganyanji shimpumulilanje.
Pabha lingongota lyangu likaatona na nshigo gwangu ukaatopa.”
Gene malangago, a Yeshu bhatendaga pita mmigunda ja ngano Lyubha lya Pumulila. Bhai, bhaajiganywa bhabho gubhakwetenje shibhanga, gubhatandwibhenje kupulula maashe ga ngano, nitauna.
Mapalishayo bhakagabhonanjeje genego, gubhaalugulilenje a Yeshu, “Nnole, bhaajiganywa bhenu bhanatendanga indu ikapinjikwa tenda Lyubha lya Pumulila.”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “Bhuli, nkanabhe shomanga ibhatendile a Daudi na ashaajabhonji pubhalinginji na shibhanga?
Shibhashite jinjila nnyumba ja a Nnungu gubhalile mikate jabhishilwe kwa ligongo lya a Nnungu jila. Pabha bhenebho nkali na ashaajabhonji bhakaapinjikwangaga kulya jene mikatejo, ikabhe bhaabhishilape.
Eu bhuli, nkanabhe shomanga nshitabhu sha Shalia ja a Musha kuti, puyakoposhelaga Lyubha lya Pumulila bhaabhishilanga bhatendaga lekanga kagula Shalia nniekalu, ikabheje bhakaganishiwanga kuti bhanalebhanga?
Bhai, ngunakummalanjilanga kuti pepano apali ali jwankulungwa kupunda liekalu.
Kaliji nkamumanyinji malombolelo ga gene malobhe gano, ‘Shingupinga shiya nngabha mbepei,’ nkanaaukumulanje bhandunji bhangalebhanga.
Pabha, Mwana juka Mundu, ni nkulungwa jwa Lyubha lya Pumulila.”
A Yeshu gubhashoshile penepo, gubhajinjile nshinagogi jabhonji.
Ashinkupagwa mundu akwete nkono upolweshe. Bhai, bhandu gubhaabhushiyenje a Yeshu, “Bhuli, ilipinjikwa kunamiya mundu Lyubha lya Pumulila?” Bhashinkwaabhuyanga nkupinga bhapatanje shiumilo sha kwaashitakia.
Ikabheje a Yeshu gubhaabhalanjilenje, “Tujile mundu munkumbi gwenunji, ngondolo jwakwe atumbushilaga nniimbo, bhuli, akanshoya mwenemo pabha Lyubha lya Pumulila?
Na mundu ni jwa mana kupunda ngondolo! Bhai, shalia jetu jinakutupinga kutenda ya mmbone Lyubha lya Pumulila.”
Kungai gubhannugulile mundu jula, “Goloya nkono gwako.” Gwaugolweye, ukulamaga nibha malinga guna gula.
Ikabheje Ashimapalishayo gubhakopokenje palanga, gubhatendilenje nkungulu shanabhuli shibhaabhulaganje a Yeshu.
A Yeshu bhakagamanyeje genego, gubhajabhwile kweneko. Bhandu bhabhagwinji gubhaakagwilenje, nigubhaalamiyenje bhalwelenji bhowe,
gubhaamulishenje bhanannugulilanje mundu ga bhenebho,
nkupinga gamalile malobhe gubhabhelekete a Ishaya ankulondola bha a Nnungu bhalinkuti,
“Nnole ntumishi jwangu juninng'agwile, Jungumpinga anonyela muntima gwangu. Shimishe Mbumu yangu muka jwenejo, Jwalakwe shalunguye ya aki ku bhandunji bhangabha Bhayaudi.
Akakola mitau wala kujobhela, Wala lilobhe lyakwe likapilikanika mmipanda.
Nnai upondeshe akautemanya, Wala utambi ushoya lyoi akauima, Mpaka pushatende ukumu jipinjikwa jitagwale.
Bhandu bhangabha Bhayaudi shibhalikulupalilanje lina lyakwe.”
Penepo bhandu gubhaapeleshelenje a Yeshu mundu jumo nangalole aliji bhubhu ligongo ashinkukola maoka. A Yeshu gubhanshoshiye lioka jula, gwakombwele kubheleketa na lola.
Lugwinjili lowe gubhakanganigwenje bhalinkutinji, “Bhuli, pana jweneju Ulongo gwa a Daudi?”
Ikabheje Mapalishayo bhakapilikananjeje genego, gubhashitenje, “Jwene munduju anashoya maoka kwa mashili gaka Bhelishebhuli, nkulungwa jwa maoka.”
A Yeshu, bhakaimanyeje ng'aniyo yabhonji, gubhaalugulilenje, upalume gogowe ugabhanikaga makundi nikanana, shiugwe, na shilambo eu likaja lyolyowe ligabhanikaga makundi nikanana, likalonjeya.
Ibhaga Lishetani anashoya maoka, bhai, upalume gwakwe shigulonjeye shanabhuli?
Mmanganya nkutinji ngunashoya maoka kwa mashili gaka Bhelishebhuli, bhuli, bhaakulupalila bhenunji bhanakwashoyanga kwa mashili gakeni? Kwa lyene ligongolyo bhanganyabho shibhanng'ukumulanje.
Ikabheje monaga ngunashoya maoka kwa mashili ga Mbumu jwa a Nnungu, bhai, mmumanyanje kuti Upalume gwa a Nnungu ung'ishilenje.
“Jwakwa mundu akombola kujinjila nnyumba jika mundu akwete mashili nikumpokonyola indu yakwe, gwangali tandubha kuntabha. Penepo shakombole kumpokonyola indu yakwe.
“Jojowe akakwiilunda na nne, anangana, naka jojowe akalopola pamo na nne, anajaanganya.
Kwa lyene ligongolyo, ngunakummalanjilanga, bhandu shibhaleshelelwanje yambi yabhonji yowe, na matukano gowe, ikabheje ga kuntukana Mbumu jwa Ukonjelo bhakaleshelelwanga.
Na kabhili, abheleketa lilobhe lya kuntauka Mwana juka Mundu shaleshelelwe, ikabheje abheleketa lilobhe lya kuntauka Mbumu jwa Ukonjelo, akaleshelelwa, wala nshilambolyo sha nnaino shino, wala shikwiyasho.
“Nkongo ubhaga gwa mmbone na iepo yakwe shiibhe ya mmbone, na nkongo ubhaga gwangali gwa mmbone na iepo yakwe shiibhe yangali ya mmbone, pabha nkongo pukumanyika kwa iepo yakwe.
Mmanganya nninginji malinga majoka! Nkukombolanga bhuli kubheleketa indu ya mmbone nninginji mmangali bha mmbonenji? Pabha mundu yabheleketa ingumbele muntima gwakwe.
Mundu jwa mmbone anatenda indu ya mmbone, pabha nshibhiko shakwe mushigumbala indu ya mmbone, ikabheje mundu jwa nyata ntima, anatenda indu ya nyata pabha ntima gwakwe ushigumbala indu ya nyata.
“Bhai, ngunakummalanjilanga, lyubha lya ukumu bhandu bhapinga kwiya jangulanga ga malobhe gowe gangali ga mmbone gubhabheleketenje.
Pabha kwa malobhe genu shinnjiye bhoneka kuti nkwete aki, na kwa malobhe genu shinng'ukumulwe.”
Penepo Mapalishayo na bhaajiganya bha Shalia bhananji gubhaalugulilenje a Yeshu, “Mmaajiganya, tunapinga tushibhone shilangulo kopoka kwenu mmwe.”
Nabhalabho gubhaajangwilenje, “Alu lubhelekolu lwa lebha na lukakulupalika kwa a Nnungu! Nnapinganga shilangulo, nkapegwanga ikabheje shilangulo sha a Yona ankulondola bha a Nnungu.
Shibhashite tama a Yona mobha gatatu shilo na mui nnipitiu lika shamaki, nneyo peyo Mwana juka Mundu shatame mobha gatatu nnitaka shilo na mui.
Bhandu bha ku Ninawi shibhakoposhelanje mobha ga ukumu, nabhalabhonji shibhaluukumulanje alu lubhelekolu kuti lushilebha, pabha bhandu bha ku Ninawi bhaipetilenje kwa ligongo lya miungu ja a Yona, na mbena apano apali ali nkulungwa kupunda a Yona.
A Malikiya bha kwibhanda shibhakoposhele alu lubhelekolu pushiluukumulwe, na bhalabho shibhaluukumule kuti lushilebha, pabha bhenebho bhashinkukopoka kwa taliya, nkupinga bhapilikane malobhe ga lunda ga a Shelemani, na mbena apano apali ali nkulungwa kupunda a Shelemani.
“Lioka anshokaga mundu, anatimbililatimbilila nng'anga nkuloleya pa pumulila na anapabhone.
Penepo anakwilugulila nnyene, ‘Shimuje kumui kungoposhele,’ ikabheje pabhuja nakupaimana pangali shindu, pali papyejilwe nikonjelewa,
shajende kwaatolanga ashimaoka bhananji shabha, bhajogoyanga kupunda jwenejo, na bhowe bhanakwiya kunjinjilanga mundujo. Na ali jika mundujo shijibhe jangali ja mmbone kupunda kundandubho. Na malinga shiipingabha kwa lubheleko lwa lebhalu.”
A Yeshu bhali nkubheleketa na bhandu bhabhagwinji, anyinabhabho na ashaapwabho gubhaikengene nijimangana palanga, bhalipinganga kubheleketa nabho.
Bhai, mundu jumo gwabhalugulile, “Anyinabhenu na ashaapwenu pubhalinginji palanga, bhanapinganga kubheleketa na mmwe.”
Ikabheje a Yeshu gubhaajangwile bhandu bhala, “A mama nne agani? Na ashapwanga nne ashigani?”
Kungai gubhaagolosheyenje nkono kwaalanguyanga bhaajiganywa bhabho, bhalinkuti, “Nnole abha ashaamama na ashaapwanga!
Pabha jojowe atenda yakupinga Atati bhali kunnungu, jwenejo ni mpwanga nne na nnumbwangu nne na a mama nne.”
Lyubha lyolyo, a Yeshu gubhajabhwile pamui pala, gubhapite tama nnyenje litanda.
Makundi gamakulungwa ga bhandu gashinkwaatimbilila mpaka a Yeshu gubhakwelile muntumbwi gubhatemi. Bhandu bhowe gubhajimingene nnyenje litanda.
Nabhalabho a Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje indu yaigwinji kwa ndango, bhalinkuti, “Mpilikananje! Nkupanda ashinkwenda panda mmbeju.
“Paliji nkumiya mmbeju, ina gwigwilile mumpanda, ijuni gwiishe nilya.
Ina gwigwilile pamaganga pangali litaka lyaligwinji. Gwiimelile shangupe pabha litaka likataliyeje,
lyubha likabhaleje, gwiinyalile, na pabha mbubhu yakwe yangajendeya gwiijumwile.
Ina gwigwilile pa mikongo ja mibha, na jalakwe gujikulile niutalila.
Ina gwigwilile pa litaka lya mmbone, gwiimelile, gwiiogwele ina makumi kumi na ina makumi shita na ina makumi gatatu.
Akwete makutujo na apilikane!”
Bhaajiganywa bhabho gubhaajendelenje nikwaabhuya, “Pakuti nnabheleketa na bhandunji kwa ndango?”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “Mmanganya nshijaliwanga kwiimanya indu ya nng'iyo ya Upalume gwa Kunnungu, ikabheje bhanganyanjibho bhangajaliwanga.
Pabha akwete shindu apinga pegwa na jenjeshewa, ikabheje jwangali shindu, nkali shakwete shila, shipinga tolwa.
Ngunabheleketa nabhonji kwa ndango, pabha bhanalolanga ikabheje shakwa shibhakushibhonanga, bhanapilikanilanga ikabheje bhakapilikananga, wala bhakaelewanga.
Gatimilile gubhabhelekete ankulondola bha a Nnungu a Ishaya ga kuti, Bhakulungwa bhaashite, ‘Kupilikana shimpilikananje, ikabheje nkaelewanga. Nkupinga lolanga, ikabheje nkashibhonanga shindu
Pabha mitima ja bhene bhandunjibha jishitopa Bhashiibhanga makutu gabhonji, Bhashikupilanga meyo gabhonji. Gwangali nneyo, bhakalolilenje na meyo gabhonji, Bhakapilikenenje na makutu gabhonji, Bhakaelewenje mmitima jabhonji, Bhakandendebhushilenje, bhashite Bhakulungwa, ngaalamiyenje.’
“Ikabheje mbaya mmanganyanji, pabha meyo genunji ganalola na makutu genunji ganapilikana.
Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, ashinkulondola bha a Nnungu na bhandunji bha aki bhabhagwinji bhashinkulokolilanga kugabhona gunkugabhonangaga, bhanagabhonanje, na pilikana gunkupilikanangaga, bhanagapilikananje.
“Bhai, mmanganya mpilikananje lutango luka nkupanda.
Jojowe akulipilikana lilobhe lya Upalume gwa Kunnungu gwangali kulielewa, pali malinga mmbeju igwilile mumpanda ila, na Lishetani anakwiyatola shipandilwe muntima gwakwe shila.
Mmbeju jipandilwe pa liganga jila jinalandana naka mundu akulipilikana lilobhe lya a Nnungu, shangupe anakuliposhela nikwiinonyela,
ikabheje akakulibhika muntima gwakwe nilonjeya, na pushiika shilaje kwa ligongo lya lyene lilobhelyo, shangupe anatenguka.
Mmbeju jigwilile pa mikongo ja mibha, inalandalana naka mundu akulipilikana lyene lilobhelyo, ikabheje ga lipamba lya shilambolyo shino na ga pinga kola indu inautalila lilobhelyo, na lyalakwe likaogoya iepo.
Mmbeju jipandilwe nnitaka lya mmbone jinalandana naka mundu akulipilikana lyene lilobhelyo na kulielewa, na jwalakwe malinga mmbeju iogoya iepo, jimo makumi kumi na jina makumi shita na jina makumi gatatu.”
A Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje bhandunji lutango luna, “Upalume gwa Kunnungu ushilandana naka mundu apandile mmbeju ya mmbone mungunda gwakwe.
Ikabheje bhandu bhalibhagonilenje, mmagongo nnjabho gwaishe, gwapandile likonde mungunda gwabho gwa ngano, gwaijabhulile.
Bhai, ngano ikameleje na tandubha tumbuka, likonde nalyalakwe gulikulile.
Bhatumishi bha bhayene nngunda bhala gubhaajendelenje, nikwaalugulila, ‘Mmakulungwa, imwapandile mmbeju ya mmbone mungunda gwenu. Igala nnaino likonde kulikopweshe kwei?’
Nabhalabho gubhaajangwilenje, ‘Amagongo ajangu bhatendile nneyo.’ Bhai, bhatumishi bhabho gubhaabhushiyenje, ‘Bhuli nnipinga tujende tukatutumbule?’
Nabhalabho gubhaajangwilenje, ‘Nngabha, inabha pushintutumbulanje likonde nnatutumbulanga na ngano.
Nnekanje yowe ikule pamo mpaka mobha ga maneng'eno. Gene mobhago shinaalugulilanje bhaunanga, nkumbililanje likonde mmatuto nijoka. Ikabheje ngano nnopolanje nkabhikanje mungokwe jangu.’ ”
A Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje bhandunji lutango luna, “Upalume gwa Kunnungu unalandana na mmbeju ja aladali jatolile mundu jumo, gwapandile mungunda gwakwe.
Mmbeju jene jajishoko kupunda mmbeju yowe, ikabheje jimelaga jinakula nipunda yalya yowe munngunda, nibha malinga nkongo gwankulungwa, nkali ijuni inakwiyashenga maui nnyambi yakwe.”
A Yeshu gubhaabalanjilenje lutango luna, “Upalume gwa Kunnugu ushilandana na ngedule jibhatolile bhakongwe bhamo, gwaangenye na utandi madebhe gabhili na nushu, utandi gowe guumwishe.”
A Yeshu bhashinkwaalugulilanga bhandu gene gowego kwa ndango. Bhangaalugulilanga shindu shoshowe gwangali ndango,
nkupinga litimilile lyelila, lyalugwilwe na ankulondola bha a Nnungu, “Shimelekete nabhonji kwa ndango Shing'unukule gaishiywe tandubhila kupanganywa kwa shilambolyo.”
Kungai a Yeshu gubhaalajilenje bhandunji bhala, gubhajinjile nnyumba. Bhaajiganywa bhabho gubhaajendelenje, gubhaabhalanjilenje, “Nntulugulile ukoto ga lutango lwa likonde munngunda.”
A Yeshu gubhaabhalanjilenje, “Apanda mmbeju ya mmbone ila, Mwana juka Mundu,
Nngunda gula shilambolyo. Mmbeju ya mmbone ila, bhandunji bhalinginji Muupalume gwa Kunnungu. Ikabheje likonde lila bhandunji bhaka Lishetani.
Mmagongo apandile likonde lila ni Lishetani. Mauno, mpelo gwa shilambolyo na bhaunanga, ashimalaika.
Malinga makonde shigakuti kumbililwa nijokwa moto, pushijiyebha lyubha lya mpelo gwa shilambolyo.
Mwana juka Mundu apinga kwatumanga ashimalaika bhakwe bhakaalopolanje koposhela Muupalume gwabho bhowenji bhalinginji shiumilo sha bhandu kutenda yambi, na bhowe bhaatendanga ya nyata.
Nikwaaleshelanga nnishembo lya moto, kweneko bhapinga gutanga na tauna meno.
Kungai, bhanguja bhala bhapinga ng'anyimanga mbuti lyubha Muupalume gwa Ainabhabhonji. Akwete makutujo na apilikane!
“Upalume gwa Kunnungu unalandana na shibhiko shiishiwe munngunda. Mundu jumo gwashibhweni, gwashiishiye kabhili. Ashinkuangalala kwa kaje, gwapite kuusha yowe yakwete, gwaumile nngunda gula.
“Kabhili, Upalume gwa Kunnungu unalandana naka mundu jumo ausha indu, nkuloleya liganga lya konja lya mmbiya yaigwinji lishemwa lulu.
Akajibhoneje lulu jimo ja mmbiya yaigwinji, gwapite usha yowe yaakwete, gwaumile lulu jila.
“Kabhili, Upalume gwa Kunnungu unalandana na lyau litejilwe mmashi, yamaki ya kila namuna gwiitanjile.
Lyau lila likagumbaleje, bhandunji gubhautilenje kunyenje bhaali, gubhatemingenenje, gubhaagwilenje yamaki ya mmbone gubhatajilenje mwiikapu yabhonji na yangali ya mmbone gubhaijailenje.
Nneyo pushijiyebha kumpelo gwa shilambolyo, shibhakoposhelanje ashimalaika, bhapinga agulanya bhandunji, bhangali bha mmbone na bhakwetenje aki,
na kwaleshelanga pa moto bhangali bha mmbonebho. Kweneko shibhagutanje na tauna meno.”
A Yeshu gubhaabhushiyenje, “Bhuli, nngaelewenje gene gowego?” Gubhaajangwilenje, “Elo.”
Nabhalabho gubhaabhalanjilenje, “Bhai nneyo, kila bhaajiganya bha Shalia bhajigenywe ga Upalume gwa Kunnungu, bhanalandana na bhayene nyumba bhashoya nshibhiko shabho indu ya ambi na ya bhukala.”
A Yeshu bhakamaliyeje kubheleketa ndango yoweyo gubhaijabhulile,
gubhapite kushijiji shabho ku Nashaleti. Kweneko gubhaajigenyenje bhandunji nshinagogi jabhonji, mpaka gubhakanganigwenje, gubhashitenje, “Jweneju kwapatile kwei lwene lunda na mashili ga tenda yene ilapoi?
Bhuli, jweneju nngabha mwanagwabho apundi shelemala bhala? Bhuli, akwabhe nngabha a Malia na ashapwakwe nngabha a Yakobho na a Yoshepu na a Shimoni na a Yuda?
Bhuli, ashalumbugwe, bhowe nngabha tulitama nabhonji pano? Bhai, kwapatile kwei gene gowega?”
Bhai, gubhaashimilenje. Ikabheje a Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje, “Nkulondola jwa a Nnungu akalepela kukuywa, ikabheje pa shilambo shakwe na kunngwakwe!”
Kwa nneyo, bhangatenda ilapo yaigwinji pepala kwa ligongo lya ungakulupalila gwabhonji.
Gene mobhago a mpalume Elode gubhapilikene ngani ja a Yeshu.
Bhai, gubhaalugulilenje bhatumishi bhabho, “Bhenebha a Yowana bhabhatisha bhashiyuka, pabha mashili gabho ganatenda ilapo.”
Pabha a Elode bhashinkwaakamula a Yowana, nikwatabha kuligelesha kwa ligongo lya a Elodia, akongobhabho a Pilipi, apwabho.
Pabha a Yowana bhashinkwaalugulila a Elode “Nngabha alali mmwe kwaalomba bhene bhakongwebho!”
A Elode bhashinkupinga kwaabhulaga a Yowana, ikabheje bhashikwaajogopanga bhandunji, pabha bhamumanyinji kuti, a Yowana ankulondola bha a Nnungu.
Lyubha lya shikukuu sha bhelekwa kwabho a Elode, mwali jwabho a Elodia ashinkuina pa bhajeninji. A Elode guyaanonyele,
mpaka gubhalumbile kumpa mwalijo shoshowe shapinga juga.
Najwalakwe, akuno ajigenywe na akwabhe, gwashite, “Mmbe nnainope nshipeta, ntwe gwa a Yowana bhabhatisha.”
A Elode gubhainjishe, ikabheje kwa ligongo lya lumbila kwabho na ga bhajeninji, gubhaamulishe apegwe.
Bhai, a Elode gubhantumile mundu kuligelesha akaakate ntwe a Yowana.
Ntwe gwabho guuishe guli nshiniya, gubhampele mwali jula, najwalakwe akwaapaga akwabhe.
Bhaajiganywa bha a Yowana gubhaikengenenje, gubhatolilenje maiti gala, gubhashishilenje. Kungai gubhapite kwaabhalanjilanga a Yeshu.
A Yeshu bhakapilikaneje ngani ja a Yowanajo, gubhajabhwile pepala na ntumbwi, gubhapite kujika kwangali bhandu. Ikabheje bhandu gubhamumanyinji, gubhaakagwilenje na makongono kukoposhela mwiilambo yabhonji.
Bhai, bhakaisheje kumbwani gubhaluweni lugwinjili lwa bhandu, gubhaabhonelenje shiya, gubhaalamiyenje bhalwele bhabhonji.
Ligulo, bhaajiganywa bhabho gubhaajendelenje gubhaalugulilenje, “Putuli pano pa anga na ligulo liishe. Bhai, mwaalajilanje bhandunji bhajendangane kushijiji bhakaiumilanje shalya.”
A Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje, “Ikapinjikwa bhajendangane, mmanganyanji mwaapanganje shalya.”
Na bhalabhonji gubhaalugulilenje, “Jitukwete mikate nng'anope na yamaki ibhili.”
A Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje, “Mmbanganje yowe akuno.”
Gubhaamulishe bhandu bhatamangane mmanyai. Kungai a Yeshu gubhatolile mikate nng'ano jila na yamaki ibhili ila, gubhalolile kunnungu, gubhaatendele eja a Nnungu. Kungai gubhagebhenye mikate jila, gubhaapelenje bhaajiganywa bhabho, na bhalabhonji gubhaapelenje bhandunji.
Bhandu bhowe gubhalilenje, nijukuta. Kungai bhaajiganywa gubhakundikenyenje malepei gala, gubhagumbeyenje ikapu yaishoko likumi limo na ibhili.
Bhandu bhalilenje bhala pubhalinginji bhanabhalume elupu nng'ano, gwangali kwabhalanganishiyanga bhanabhakongwe na bhana.
Shangupe, a Yeshu gubhaamulishenje bhaajiganywa bhabho bhakwelanje muntumbwi, bhalongolelanje jomboka litanda akuno bhalikwaalajilanga bhandunji.
Bhakaalajilanjeje bhandunji, gubhakwelile kushitumbi jikape kujuga Nnungu. Lyene ligulolyo pubhaliji jikape kweneko,
na gene malangago ntumbwi gula pugwaliji tome pakati pakati litanda, ikabheje gwatendaga komwa na mabhimbili pabha mbungo jatendaga puga kopoka mmujo jabhonji.
Shilo, tome na kumashelo, a Yeshu gubhaajendelenje bhaajiganywa bhalikwenda panani mashi.
Bhaajiganywa bhabho bhaakabhonanjeje bhalikwenda pantundu mashi gubhajogopenje kwa kaje, gubhashitenje, “Lioka!” Gubhajobhelenje bhalijogopanga.
Shangupe, a Yeshu gubhabhelekete nabhonji, “Mwiilumanje ntima, ni nne. Nnajogopanje!”
A Petili gubhaalugulile, “Mmakulungwa, ibhaga kweli mmwe, nnugulile nyiye kweneko pantundu mashi.”
A Yeshu gubhashite, “Ayaga, nnjiye.” A Petili gubhatulwishe muntumbwi mula gubhatandwibhe kwenda panani mashi, bhalikwaajendela a Yeshu.
Ikabheje bhakajibhoneje mbungo jila, bhakujogopaga, gubhatandwibhe titimila, gubhagutile nguto, “Mmakulungwa, nndapule!”
Penepo a Yeshu gubhagolweye nkono gwabho, gubhaakamwile nikwaalugulila, “Mmwe nkwete ngulupai jishoko! Pakuti mwangakulupalila malobhe gangu?”
Kungai gubhakwelilenje muntumbwi mula, na mbungo jila jikupumulaga.
Bhowe bhalinginji muntumbwi mula guhaatindibhalilenje, bhalinkutinji, “Kweli mmwe ni Bhanabho a Nnungu.”
Gubhajombokenje litanda, gubhaikengenenje kushilambo sha Geneshaleti.
Bhandunji bha kwekula bhakamumanyanjeje, gubhashumiyenje nganijo mmbali yowe. Bhai gubhaapeleshelenje a Yeshu bhalwelenji bhowe,
gubhaashondelesheyenje bhaalekanje bhaakwayanje nkali libhiniko lya ngubho jabho. Na bhowe bhaakwashiyenje gubhalamilenje.
Kungai Mapalishayo na bhaajiganya bha Shalia gubhaikengenenje koposhela ku Yelushalemu, gubhaajendelenje a Yeshu, nikwaabhuya,
“Pakuti bhaajiganywa bhenu bhakakamulanga ikubho itujigenywe na bhanangulungwa bhetu? Bhakaanabhanga makono ukoto pa shalya.”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “Pakuti numbe mmanganyanji nnalekanga Shalia ja a Nnungu, nikagulila ikubho yenunji?
A Nnungu bhaashite, ‘Gwaajogope ainago na akwenu, pabha ishijandikwa, akwaatukana ainagwe eu akwabhe, abhulagwe.’
Ikabheje mmanganya nnajiganyanga kuti mundu abhaga na shindu shakwaapa ainagwe eu akwabhe, ikabheje ashibheleketa, ‘Shene shindushi njikwaapa a Nnungu,’
bhai, akapinjikwa kabhili kwaajogopa ainagwe nikwaapa! Nnei shinkuti kulinyegeyanga lilobhe lya a Nnungu nkukagula ikubho yenunji.
Mmanganya mmagulumba! A Ishaya bhalondwele ukoto genu mmanganya.”
A Nnungu bhanabheleketa, “ ‘Bhene bhandunjibha bhananyogopanga kwa malobhepe, Ikabheje mitima jabhonji jishitalikangana na nne.
Kundindibhalila kwabhonji kwayoyo, Pabha majiganyo gabhonji ni malajilo ga shigundupe.’ ”
A Yeshu gubhaashemilenje bhandu bhagumbelenje bhala, gubhaalugulilenje, “Mpilikananje, na mmumanyanje!
Shindu shalya mundu shikakuntenda mundu anyate, ikabhe malobhe gakopoka nkang'wa, ni gakuntenda mundu anyate.”
Kungai bhaajiganywa gubhaajendelenje, nikwaabhuya, “Bhuli, mmumanyi kuti Mapalishayo bhashinkutumbalanga bhakapilikananjeje malobhe genu?”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “Litepo lyolyowe lyangapandwa na Atati bha kunnungu, lipingatutumbulwa.
Mwaalekanje bhanganyabho, ashikalongolele nangalole. Nangalole annongoyaga nangalole mwine, bhowe bhanaabhili shibhatumbushilanje nniimbo.”
A Petili gubhashite, “Nntulugulile ukoto ga lutango.”
A Yeshu gubhashite, “Nkali mmanganya mpaka nnaino nkanabhe kumumanyanga?
Bhuli, nkakumumanyanga kuti shoshowe shijinjila nkang'wa shinakwenda nnipitiu na kungai shinaepukwa kulilindi?
Ikabheje malobhe gakopoka nkang'wa mugakoposhele muntima, na genego ni gakuntenda mundu anyate.
Pabha muntima inakoposhela ng'aniyo ya nyata, kubhulaga na labhalabha na gwii na kong'ondela unami na matukano.
Genego ni gakuntenda mundu anyate. Ikabheje kulya shalya gwangali nabha makono kukakuntenda mundu anyate.”
A Yeshu gubhajabhwile pepala gubhapite tama mmbali ja ku Tilo na ku Shidoni.
Bhai, bhakongwe bhamo Bhakanaani bha shene shilambosho gubhaaishile, gubhautiye lilobhe bhalinkuti, “Mmakulungwa, Bhaulongo gwa a Daudi, mmonele shiya! Mwali jwangu analaga kaje lioka.”
Ikabheje a Yeshu bhangaajangula. Bhai, bhaajiganywa bhabho gubhaajendelenje, nikwaabhalanjila, “Mwaalugulile bhajabhule, pabha bhanakutukagula bhalijobhela.”
A Yeshu gubhajangwile, “Nangatumwa ikabhe kubhandu bha ku Ishilaeli bhalinginji malinga ngondolo iobhile.”
Penepo bhakongwe bhala gubhaatindibhalile, bhalinkuti, “Mmakulungwa, nnjiye kunnyangutile.”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwile, “Nngabha mmbone tola shalya sha bhana nikwiijaila mbwa.”
Bhakongwe bhala gubhashite, “Kweli, Mmakulungwa, ikabheje nkali mbwa inalya malepeyo gagwa pa mesha ya ashinangologwe.”
Penepo a Yeshu gubhajangwile, “Mama, ngulupai jenu jikulungwa, bhai, ntendelwe malinga shinkupinga.” Lioka jula akunshokaga mwali jula, nigwalamile malanga gala.
A Yeshu gubhashoshile pepala gubhapite nnyenje litanda lya Galilaya, gubhajombweshe ku shitumbi, nigubhatemi.
Bhandu bhabhagwinji gubhaaishilenje bhalikwaapeleshelanga bhalemelenje na ashinangalole na ashinangwabha na bhubhu na bhalwelenji bhabhagwinji, gubhaabhishilenje mmujo jabho, nabhalabho a Yeshu gubhaalamiyenje.
Lugwinjili lwa bhandu lula lwashinkulapa bhakaabhonanjeje ashibhubhu bhalibheleketanga, bhalemelenje bhalamilenje, ashinangwabha bhalijimajimanga, na ashinangalole bhalilolanga, bhandu gubhaainiyenje a Nnungu bha Ishilaeli.
Bhai, a Yeshu gubhaashemilenje bhaajiganywa bhabho, gubhashite, “Ngunakwaabhonelanga shiya bhandunjibha, pabha bhashitamangana na nne mobha gatatu, nnaino bhangalinginji shalya. Ngapinga kwaalekanga bhajabhulangane gwangali kulya shalya, bhanaondokanga mumpanda.”
Bhaajiganywa bhabho gubhaalugulilenje, “Putulipano paanga, shitupate kwei shalya sha jukuta bhandu bhabhagwinji nnei?”
A Yeshu gubhaabhushiyenje, “Mikate jilingwa jinkwetenje?” Gubhaajangwilenje, “Shabha na yamaki ishokope.”
Bhai, a Yeshu gubhaamulishenje bhandu bhatamangane pai.
Gubhatolile mikate shabha jila na yamaki ila, gubhatendile eja kwa a Nnungu, gubhagebhenye, gubhaapelenje bhaajiganywa bhabho, na bhalabhonji gubhaagabhanishiyenje bhandunji.
Bhowe gubhalilenje nijukuta. Kungai gubhakundikenyenje malepei, gubhagumbeyenje ikapu shabha yaikulungwa.
Bhalilenjebho pubhalinginji bhanabhalume elupu nsheshe, gwangali kubhalanganishiya bhanabhakongwe na bhana.
Bhai, a Yeshu gubhaalajilenje bhandunji, gubhakwelile muntumbwi, gubhapite mmbali ja ku Magadani.
Mapalishayo na Mashadukayo gubhaajendelenje a Yeshu, bhalikwaatejelanga, gubhaajujilenje bhaatendelanje shilangulo kopoka kunnungu.
A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “Shiikaga shigulogulo mmanganya nkutinji, ‘Malabhi kupingasha ukoto pabha liunde lishishejela!’
Kulisha nkutinji, ‘Lelo kukasha ukoto mbungo jipinga puga, pabha liunde lishishejela na maunde gashibhindula!’ Bhai, mmanganya nnamanyililanga kujimanya miongwe kwa lola liunde, ikabheje nkakwimanyanga ilangulo ya jene miongwe jino?
Lubheleko lwa lebha na lukakulupalika kwa a Nnungu! Nnapinganga shilangulo, ikabheje lukapegwa shilangulo shoshowe ikabhe shilangulo sha a Yona.” Bhai, gubhaaleshilenje, nigubhaijabhulile.
Bhaajiganywa bhabho bhakajombokanjeje ng'ambu jabhili ja litanda, gubhang'amulenje kuti bhashilibhalanga kujigala mikate.
A Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje, “Mwilolesheyanje na mwiteiganje na ngedule ya Mapalishayo na Mashadukayo!”
Ikabheje bhalabhonji gubhataukengenenje ashayenenji, “Bhanabheleketa nneyo pabha twangajigala mikate.”
A Yeshu gubhaimanyi ng'aniyo yabhonji, gubhaalugulilenje, “Mmanganya mmandunji bha ngulupai jishoko! Pakuti nnabheleketanga ga ligongo lya ngajigala mikate?
Bhuli, nkanabhe ng'amulanga? Bhuli, nkaakumbushilanga punagebhenye mikate nng'ano jila kwa bhanabhalume elupu nng'ano? Bhuli ikapu yaishoko ilingwa imwagumbeyenje ya malepei?
Eu, mikate shabha jila jibhagabhanishiywenje bhanabhalume elupu nsheshe, bhuli, imwakundikenyenje ikapu yaikulungwa ilingwa ya malepei?
Pakuti nkang'amulanga kuti ngabheleketaga ga mikate? Ikabheje mwiteiganje na ngedule ya Mapalishayo na Mashadukayo!”
Penepo bhaajiganywa gubhamumanyinji kuti bhashikwaalugulilanga bhaiteiganje nngabha na ngedule ya mmikate, ikabheje bhaiteiganje na majiganyo ga Mapalishayo na Mashadukayo.
A Yeshu bhakaisheje mmbali ja ku Kaishalia Pilipi, gubhaabhushiyenje bhaajiganywa bhabho, “Bhandu bhakutinji Mwana juka Mundu ni gani?”
Gubhaajangwilenje, “Bhananji bhakutinji a Yowana Bhabhatisha, bhananji a Eliya, bhananji a Yelemia, eu jumo munkumbi gwa ashinkulondola bha a Nnungu.”
A Yeshu gubhaabhushiyenje, “Na mmanganyanji bhuli, nkutinji nne gani?”
A Shimoni Petili gubhajangwile, “Mmwe a Kilishitu, Bhanabhabho a Nnungu, bhali bhabhakoto.”
A Yeshu gubhashite, “Mbaya mmwe a Shimoni bhanabhabho a Yona, pabha nngabha mundu anng'ibhulile yenei, ikabhe Atati bhali kunnungu.
Nne ngunakunnugulila mmwe a Petili, mmwe lindandawe na panani lindandawe ngupinga shenga likanisha lyangu, wala mashili ga kundamo ja bhawilenje gakalikombola.
Shinimpe punguo ya Upalume gwa Kunnungu, shoshowe shishintabhe pa shilambolyo, shishitabhwe kunnungu na shoshowe shishinngopole pa shilambolyo, shishigopolwe kunnungu.”
Kungai gubhaalimbiyenje bhaajiganywa bhabho, bhanannugulilanje mundu jojowe kuti bhenebho a Kilishitu.
Tandubhila gene malangago a Yeshu gubhatandwibhe kwaalugulilanga bhaajiganywa bhabho gwangali nng'iyo kuti bhanapinjikwa kwenda ku Yelushalemu, na kweneko bhapinga potekwa na bhanangulungwa na bhakulungwanji bhaabhishila na bhaajiganya bha Shalia. Kuti, bhapinga bhulagwa na lyubha lya tatu shibhayuywe.
A Petili gubhaatolile kuntemela, gubhatandwibhe kwaakalipila, “Inabhe nneyo Mmakulungwa! Lyeneli likankoposhela!”
Ikabheje a Yeshu gubhatendebhwishe, gubhaalugulile a Petili, “Nnyabhulile apano, Lishetani! Mmwe nnang'ibhilila. Ng'aniyo yenu nngabha ya a Nnungu ikabhe ya shigundu!”
Kungai a Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje bhaajiganywa bhabho, “Mundu jojowe apinga ngagula nne, anapinjikwa aikane nnyene, ajigale nshalabha gwakwe angagule.
Pabha, mundu apinga kulama gwangali ngulupalila nne, akakola gumi gwa pitipiti, ikabheje shakunde bhulagwa kwa ligongo lya ngulupalila nne, shakole gumi gwa pitipiti.
Mundu shiimpwaile nndi apataga indu yowe ya pa shilambolyo na akuno aliobhya gumi gwakwe gwa pitipiti? Eu, mundu shashoye shindu shashi pa gumi gwakwe gwa pitipiti?
Pabha, Mwana juka Mundu shaishe na ukonjelo gwa Ainagwe pamo na ashimalaika bhakwe, penepo shannipe kila mundu malinga shashite tenda.
Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, bhapalinji bhananji pepano bhakawanganga bhakanabhe kummonanga Mwana juka Mundu alikwiiya malinga Mpalume.”
Gakapiteje mobha shita, a Yeshu gubhaatolilenje a Petili na a Yakobho na a Yowana apwabho, gubhajombokenje ku shitumbi shashileu.
Kweneko, a Yeshu gubhapindikwishe lubhombo pa meyo gabhonji, kumeyo kwabho kwashinkung'anyima malinga lyubha na nngubho yabho puyaliji yanawe malinga shilangaya.
A Musha na a Eliya gubhaakoposhelenje, gubhalinginji nkubheleketa na a Yeshu.
Penepo a Petili gubhaalugulile a Yeshu, “Mmakulungwa, shankonja uwe kubha apano! Mpingaga shinjenje mabhanda gatatu, limo lyenu na lina lya a Musha na lina lya a Eliya.”
Pubhaliji nkubheleketa nneyo, liunde lya nawe likwaaunishilangaga, lilobhe gulipilkanishe koposhela nniundemo, “Jweneju ni mwanangu jungumpinga, anonyela, mumpilikanilanje.”
Bhaajiganywa bhakapilikananjeje nneyo gubhagwilenje namanguku, gubhajogopenje kaje.
A Yeshu gubhaajendelenje, nikwaakwayanga, gubhashite, “Nnjimangane, nnajogopanje!”
Bhakalolanjeje kunani bhangammonanga mundu juna, ikabhe a Yeshu jikape.
Bhai, pubhalinginji bhalielelanga kopoka kushitumbi, a Yeshu gubhaalimbiyenje bhalinkuti, “Nnannugulilanje mundu indu imwiibhweninji, mpaka Mwana juka Mundu pashayuywe.”
Kungai bhaajiganywa bhabho gubhaabhushiyenje, “Pakuti bhaajiganya bha Shalia bhakutinji inapinjikwa bhatandubhe kuika a Eliya?”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “Kweli, a Eliya shibhaishe kualaya indu yowe.
Ikabheje ngunakummalanjilanga, a Eliya bhaaishe bhanganyabho bhangaamanyanga, ikabhe bhashinkwaatendelanga mwaapinjilenje. Nneyo peyo mwana juka Mundu apinga potekwa mmakono gabhonji.”
Penepo bhaajiganywa bhala gubhamumanyinji kuti bhatendaga kwaabhalanjilanga ga a Yowana Bhabhatisha.
Bhakaikangananjeje ku bhandu bhagumbelenje bhala, bhandu bhamo gubhaajendele a Yeshu, nikwaatindibhalila,
gubhashite, “Mmakulungwa, mummonele shiya mwanangu ashikola shialala, numbe analaga kaje, papagwinji anagwila pa moto eu mmashi.
Nashinkumpeleka kubhaajiganywa bhenu ikabheje bhangakombolanga kunshoya.”
A Yeshu gubhajangwile, “Alu lubheleko lwangali ngulupai na lwa puganika! Shindame na mmanganya mpaka shakani? Shinikakatimile na mmanganya mpaka shakani? Munnjiyenajonji akuno mwanajo,”
Bhai, a Yeshu gubhankalipile liokajo, nigwanshoshile mwana jula, gwalamile malanga gala.
Kungai bhaajiganywa gubhaajendelenje a Yeshu shintemela, gubhaabhushiyenje, “Pakuti uwe twangakombola kunshoya lioka jula?”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “Kwa ligongo lya ungakulupalila gwenunji. Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, ibhaga shinkolanje ngulupai, nkali jajishoko malinga mbeju ja aladali, shinkombolanje kushilugulila nkali ashi shitumbishi, ‘Shokapa ujende akula,’ shishijende. Shakwa shoshowe shikaakomboleka kungwenunji.”
Ikabheje lioka jwa nnei akashoka ila kwa tabha na juga.
Pubhalinginji pamo ku Galilaya, a Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje, “Mwana juka Mundu apinga kamuywa ku bhandunji.
Bhapinga kummulaganga, ikabheje lyubha lya tatu shayuywe.” Bhaajiganywa gubhainjikenje kaje.
A Yeshu na bhaajiganywa bhabho bhakaikanganeje ku Kapalanaumu, bhakamula koli ja liekalu bhala gubhaajendelenje a Petili, gubhaabhushiyenje, “Bhuli, bhaajiganya bhenunji bhalilipa koli ja Liekalu?”
A Petili gubhajangwile, “Elo, bhalilipa.” Bhai a Petili bhakajinjileje nnyumba, bhakanabhe bheleketa lilobhe, a Yeshu gubhaabhushiye, “A Shimoni, mmwe nkubhona bhuli? Ashimpalume bha shilambolyo bhanalonganga koli kwa ashigani? Kwa ashaayene shilambo eu ku bhajeninji?”
A Petili gubhajangwile, “Kopoka ku bhajeninji.” A Yeshu gubhaalugulile, “Bhai monaga nneyo, bhashilambo bhakaalipanga koli.
Ikabheje tunaatumbayanje, nnjende kulitanda nkatambishe ndowana, shamaki shatandubhe tanjilajo muntole, munng'unukule kang'wa, nkatimo shimwiimane mmbiya ya koli. Ntole nkaapanganje pangunne na mmayene.”
Gene mobhago bhaajiganywa gubhaajendelenje a Yeshu, gubhabhushiyenje, “Gani ali jwankulungwa Muupalume gwa Kunnungu?”
A Yeshu gubhanshemile mwana jumo, gubhannjimishe pakati jabhonji,
gubhashite, “Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, nkatendebhukanje nibha malinga bhana, ngu, nkajinjilanga Muupalume gwa Kunnungu.”
Jojowe akwiinyegaya nibha malinga aju mwanaju, jwenejo shaabhe jwankulungwa Muupalume gwa Kunnungu.
Jojowe akumposhela mwana jumo malinga jweneju kwa ligongo lyangu nne, anamboshela nne.
Jojowe shannebhye jumo jwa bhashokonji bhaangulupalinga nne, mbaya akatabhilwe liganga likulungwa nnukoi nileshelwa pa shilindili sha mashi.
Ole gwenunji bhandu bha pa shilambolyo kwa ligongo lya ilokoli. Ilokoli shiikoposhele, ikabheje ole gwakwe jwene shaikumbuyejo.
“Monaga nkono eu lukongono lwenu lunnebhyaga, nnukate na nnjae kwataliya. Mbaya nnjinjile mugumi gwa pitipiti nni gwangali nkono eu lukongono, nngalingana na leshelwa pa moto gwa pitipiti nni na makono na makongono genu ganaabhili.
Liyo lyenu linnebhyaga, nnikolotole na kulijaa kwataliya. Mbaya nnjinjile mugumi gwa pitipiti nni na shongo, nngalingana leshelwa pa moto gwa ku Jeanamu nni na meyo genu ganaabhili.
“Mwiteiganje! Nnannyegayanje jumo jwa bhashokonjibha. Ngunakummalanjilanga, ashimalaika bhabhonji kunnunguko mobha gowe pubhalinginji tome na Atati bha Kunnungu.
Pabha Mwana juka Mundu ashinkwiya kwaatapulanga bhandu bhaobhilenje.
Nkubhonanga bhuli? Mundu akolaga ngondolo makumi kumi, anng'obhaga jumo, shatende bhuli? Anakwiileka ngondolo makumi tisha na tisha ila pa shitumbi, nikwenda kunnoleya aobhile jula.
Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, ampataga apinga kwinonyela kupunda makumi tisha na tisha yangaobha ila.
Nneyo peyo, Ainabhenunji bha Kunnungu bhakaapinga aobhe nkali jumo jwa bhashokonjibha.
“Mpwenu annebhelaga, munjendele nkanneye nninginji mmabhilipe. Ampilikanaga mumpatile mpwenu.
Akampilikane, nnjende naka mundu jumo eu bhabhili na mmayene, nkupinga kwa ukong'ondelo gwa bhandu bhabhili eu bhatatu, monaga lipali lilobhe limanyishe nimala.
Akaapilikanilanje bhanganyabho, mwaalugulilanje bhandu bha nnikanisha. Na monaga akaapilikanilanje, mumone malinga bhandu bhakakwaamanyanga a Nnungu eu bhakamula koli.
“Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, shoshowe shishintabhanje pa shilambolyo, shishitabhwe kunnungu, na shoshowe shishinngopolanje pa shilambolyo shishigopolwe kunnungu.
Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga kabhili, bhabhili bhenunji pa shilambolyo bhalaganangaga shoshowe sha juga, Atati bhali kunnungu shibhaatendelanje.
Pabha popowe pubhaimananga bhandu bhabhlili eu bhatatu kwa ligongo lyangu nne, nne mbali pamo na bhanganyabho.”
Kungai a Petili gubhaajendele a Yeshu, gubhaabhushiye, “Bhuli Mmakulungwa, mpwanga anebhele palingwa ninneshelele? Nkali pa shabha?”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwile, “Ngaalugula mala shabhape, ikabhe nkali makumi shabha mala shabha.
Pabha Upalume gwa Kunnungu unalandana naka mpalume jumo atendile eshabhu ika ntumishi jwakwe.
Eshabhu ikatandubheje, gubhapeleshelwe mundu jumo alongwaga ligambo mmbiya yaigwinji.
Jwene mundujo akakweteje shindu sha lipa, bhakulungwa bhakwe gubhaamulishe aushwe jwenejo na akagwe na ashibhanagwe na indu yowe yaakwete, nkupinga lipila ligambo lila.
Bhai, ntumishi jula gwabhatindibhalile, nigwashite, ‘Nnindile shininnipe ligambo lyenu lyowe.’
Bhakulungwa bhala gubhammonele shiya ntumishi jula, gubhanneshelele ligambo lila, gubhanneshile aijabhulile.
“Ntumishi jula gwajabhwile, gwanng'imene ntumishi nnjakwe annongaga ligambo lya mmbiya makumi kumi. Gubhankamwile, nikunkida pa nngulo alinkuti, ‘Unipe inguulonga!’
Ntumishi nnjakwe jula akuntindibhalilaga nikunshondelesheya, alinkuti ‘Nninde shininnipe yowe’.
Ikabheje jwanngakunda, gwapite kuntabha kuligelesha mpaka pushalipe ligambo lyowe.
“Bhai, bhatumishi ajakwenji bhakaibhonanjeje itendeshe gubhainginikenje kwa kaje, nigubhapite kwatashiyanga bhakulungwa bhabhonji gakoposhele.
Bhakulungwa bhala gubhanshemile ntumishi jula, gubhammalanjlile, ‘Ugwe ujwanyata ntima! Gwashinkunyuga nikuleshelele, gunikuleshelele ligambo lyako lyowe.
Bhuli, ikapinjikweje ugwe kummonnela shiya ntumishi nnjako malinga shinikubhonele shiya nne?’
“Bhai, bhakulungwa bhala gubhatumbele kaje, nigubhampeleshe akapotekwe mpaka pushalipe ligambo lyowe.
A Yeshu gubhashite, Atati bhali kunnungu shibhantendelanje nneyo peyo monaga mundu akanneshelele mpwakwe mpaka muntima.”
A Yeshu bhakamaliyeje kubheleketa gene malobhego, gubhajabhwile ku Galilaya nigubhapite ku Yudea, kung'ambu lushi lwa Yolodani.
Bhandu bhabhagwinji gubhaakagwilenje kweneko, gubhaalamiyenje bhalwelenji.
Mapalishayo bhananji gubhaaishilenje, gubhaalinjilenje bhalinkutinji, “Bhuli, alali mundu kunneka nkagwe kwa shiumilo shoshowe?”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “Bhuli, nkanabhe shomanga Majandiko ga Ukonjelo kuti a Nnungu kundandubho bhashikumpanganya mundu jwa shileu naka jwankongwe,
nigubhashite, ‘Kwa lyene ligongolyo, jwannume shabhaleshe ainagwe na akwabhe, nilundana na akagwe, na bhanaabhili shibhabhanganje shiilu shimo?’
Kwa nneyo, bhanganyabho nngabha bhabhili kabhili, ikabhe shiilu shimo. Bhai, shibhalundikenye a Nnungu, mundu analekanye.”
Ikabheje Mapalishayo gubhaabhushiyenje, “Bhai, kwa ndi a Musha bhashinkutulajila kunneka, nikunnjandishila talaka jwankongwe?”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “A Musha bhashinkunnekanga ntendanje nneyo kwa ligongo lya nonopa mitima jenunji, ikabheje kundandubho ikaliji nneyo.
Bhai ngunakummalanjilanga, jojowe shanneshe nkagwe ikabhe kwa ligongo lya labhalabha, nilomba jwankongwe juna, analabhalabha na akunnomba jwankongwe aleshilwe jula analabhalabha.”
Bhaajiganywa bhabho gubhaalugulilenje, “Ibhaga indu ya mundu naka nkagwe ili nneyo, mbaya nngalomba.”
A Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje, “Nngabha bhowe shibhakundanje gene majiganyo gano, ikabhe bhajaliwenje na a Nnungu kutama gwangalomba bhala.
Pabha ipali iumilo ya tama gwangalomba, bhana shibhelekwa, bhana bhashiunwanga ntonga na bhandu, na bhana kwa ligongo lya tumishila Upalume gwa Kunnungu. Akombola kukunda gene majiganyo gano, akunde.”
Kungai bhandu gubhaapeleshelenje a Yeshu bhana bhabhashoko nkupinga bhaabhishilanje makono nikwaajujilanga. Ikabheje bhaajiganywa bhabho gubhaakalipilenje.
A Yeshu gubhashite, “Mwaalekanje bhanabho bhajiyangane kwangu nne, wala nnaaibhililanje, pabha Upalume gwa Kunnungu gwa bhandunji bhalinginji malinga bhanabha.”
Bhai, gubhaabhishilenje makono nkwaajujilanga mboka, nigubhashoshile pepala.
Mundu jumo ashinkwaishila a Yeshu, gwabhabhushiye, “Mmajiganya mmammbone, ndende shindu shashi sha mmbone nkupinga mbate gumi gwa pitipiti?”
A Yeshu gubhammalanjile, “Pakuti, unanjema najwammbone? A Nnungupe jikape nibhali bhammbone. Upingaga kujinjila mugumi gwa pitipiti, ukunde amuli ya a Nnungu.”
Mundu jula akwaabhuyaga, “Amuli yashi?” A Yeshu gubhashite, “Unabhulaje, Unalabhelabhe, Unajibhe, Unakong'ondele unami,
Gwaajogope ainago na akwenu, na gumpinje ntami nnjako malinga shukwiipinga gwamwene.”
Nshanda jula gwabhalugulile, “Gene gowego nigakamwile, shindubhile nndi kabhili?”
A Yeshu gubhannugulile, “Monaga upingaga kukamilika, kaushe indu yako, mmbiyayo ukaapanganje bhaalaga, na ugwe shukole shibhiko kunnungu, kungai ujiye kuungagule.”
Nshanda jula akapilikaneje genego, gwaijabhulile ali ainjishe, pabha ashinkubha tajili.
A Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje bhaajiganywa bhabho, “Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga ipingabha ukomu tajili kujinjila Muupalume gwa Kunnungu.
Ngunakummalanjilanga kabhili, ikakomala kuka nnyama jwankulungwa jwa langwa ashemwa ngamia, kupeleta pa lilanga lya ingano, nngalingana tajili kujinjila Muupalume gwa Kunnungu.”
Bhakapilikananjeje nneyo bhaajiganywa bhala gubhalapilenje kwa kaje, nigubhashitenje “Bhai gani, shakombole kutapulwa?”
A Yeshu gubhaalolilenje, nigubhashite, “Ku bhandu indu malinga yeneyo ikaakomboleka, ikabheje kwa mashili ga a Nnungu, yowe inakomboleka.”
Kungai a Petili gubhashite, “Bhuli uwe? Tushileka yowe kunkagula mmwe, bhai shitupate nndi?”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga kunnungu na shilambolyo pushiijiyebha ya ambi, Mwana juka Mundu shatame pa shitengu shakwe sha ukonjelo, numbe mmanganya likumi limo na bhabhili nngagwilenje nne, shintamangane mwiitengu likumi limo na ibhili nnikwaukumulanga makabhila likumi limo na gabhili ga Ishilaeli.
Na jojowe aleshile nyumba, eu ashaapwakwe eu ashaalumbugwe, eu ainagwe eu akwabhe, eu bhana eu migunda, kwa ligongo lyangu nne, shaposhele mala makumi kumi na shakole gumi gwa pitipiti.
Ikabheje bhabhagwinji bhalinginji bhantai, shibhabhanganje bha kumpelo, na bhalinginji bha kumpelo shibhabhanganje bhantai.
“Upalume gwa Kunnungu ushilandana naka mundu akwete nngunda gwa mishabhibhu, nilabha lyamba kukwaatolanga bhakamula maengo kubhakamulanje liengo mungunda gwakwe.
Gubhalegene nabhonji kwaalipanga ela jimo kwa lyubha limo, kungai gubhaapelekenje kunngunda gwabho.
Jikaisheje shaa tatu ja lyamba gubhapite kabhili kushoko gubhaabhweninji bhandunji bhana bhajimingenenje kushoko, bhangalinginji shatenda.
Gubhaalugulilenje, ‘Nnjendangananje nkakamulanje liengo kunngunda gwangu gwa mishabhibhu, na nne shininnimpanganje aki jenunji.’
Bhai, gubhapitengene. Bhayene nngunda bhala gubhapite kabhili shaa shita ja mui, na shaa tisha nndengulo, gubhatendile nneila peila.
Nkali shaa kumi na moja ja shigulogulo, gubhapite kabhili, gubhaaimenenje bhandunji bhana bhajimingenenje kushoko. Bhai, gubhaabhushiyenje, ‘Pakuti nshijimangana totolo gwangali kamula liengo?’
Gubhaajangwilenje, ‘Pabha jwakwapi atupele liengo.’ Nabhalabho gubhaalugulilenje, ‘Nnjendanje nkakamulanje liengo mungunda gwa mishabhibhu.’
“Kukapilileje, bhayene nngunda bhala gubhannugulile nkujimilila jwabho, ‘Gwaashemanje bhaakamula maengo gwaalipanje nshaala gwabhonji, tandubhila jwa kumpelo, mpaka jwa ntai.’
Bhai, gubhaikengene bha kumpelo bhala, gubhaposhelenje kila mundu ela jimo.
Bhakaikanganeje bhatainji bhala, pubhaganishiyenje shibhapegwanje kupunda bhananji bhala, ikabheje na bhalabhonji gubhapegwilwenje ela jimo jimo
Gubhaposhelenje ela yabhonji, gubhatandwibhenje kwainginishila bhakulungwa bhala.
Bhalinkutinji, ‘Abha bhandunji bhatolilwenje kumpelo bhashikamulanga liengo lishaa limope, pakuti nshikututendela malinga bhanganyabha, uwe tushikamula liengo kwa kaje nibhalilwa na lyubha totolo?’
“Bhakulungwa bhala gubhannjangwile jumo, ‘Ambwiga, shakwa shininkumbile! Bhuli, twangalagana nshaala gwa ela jimo kwa lyubha limo?
Nntole aki jenu, mwijabhulile. Njipinga kwaapanganga bha kumpelobha malinga mmwe.
Bhuli, ngapinjikwa tenda shingupinga namwene kwa indu yangu? Bhuli, nnamonela lupimilo pabha njibha nannguja?’ ”
A Yeshu gubhamaliye bheleketa bhalinkuti, “Bhalinginji kumpelo shibhabhanganje bha ntai, na bha ntai, shibhabhanganje bha kumpelo.”
A Yeshu pubhajombokaga kwenda ku Yelushalemu, bhashinkwaatolanga bhaajiganywa likumi limo na bhabhili bhala kuntemela na bhalinginji mumpanda gubhaalugulilenje,
“Mpilikananje! Tunakwenda ku Yelushalemu, na kweneko Mwana juka Mundu apinga kamuywa ku bhakulungwa bhaabhishila na bhaajiganya bha Shalia na bhalabhonji shibhanng'ukumulanje abhulagwe.
Shibhankamuyanje kubhandu bhangabha Bhayaudi, nkupinga bhannyegayanje na akomwe ibhoko na komelwa munshalabha, ikabhe lyubha lya tatu shayuywe.”
Penepo anyinabhabhonji bhana bha a Shebhedayo gubhaaishile a Yeshu bhali na ashibhana bhabho, gubhaatindibhalile nikwaajuga shindu.
A Yeshu gubhaabhushiye, “Nkupinga nndi?” Bhakongwe bhala gubhaalugulile, “Nnumbile kuti ashibhanangubha shibhatamangananje Muupalume gwenu jumo nkono nshinda na juna nkono nnilo.”
A Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje, “Nkakushimanyanga shinkujuganga. Bhuli, shinkombolanje kwiipililila malanga ga mboteko malinga shimbinga pitila nne?” Gubhaajangwilenje, “Shitukombole.”
A Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje, “Kweli shimwiipilililanje malanga ga mboteko gumbinga pitila nne, ikabheje gani shatame kunkono nnilo eu nkono nshinda gwangu, nngabha gangu nne, ikabhe shibhapegwanje bhapanjilwenje na a Nnungu bhala.”
Bhaajiganywa likumi limo bhala bhakapilikananjeje genego, gubhaatumbalilenje ashaajabhonji bhabhili bhala.
A Yeshu gubhaashemilenje, gubhaalugulilenje, “Mmumanyinji kuti bhaatagwala bha bhandu bhangabha Bhayaudi bhanakwaatagwalanga bhandu kwa mashili, na bhakulungwanji bhabhonji bhanakwabhonelanga nneyo peyo.
Kwenu mmanganya inabhe nneyo, ikabhe mundu apinga kubha jwankulungwa, abhe ntumishi jwenunji,
na mundu apinga kubha jwantai munkumbi gwenunji abhe ntumwa jwenunji.
Nneyo peyo, Mwana juka Mundu jwangaika kukamulilwa maengo, ikabheje kukamula liengo na shoya gumi gwakwe nkupinga kwaagombolanga bhandu bhabhagwinji.”
A Yeshu na bhaajiganywa bhabho bhalishokangana ku Yeliko, lugwinjili lwa bhandu gulwaakagwile.
Bhai, bhashinkupagwanga ashinangalole bhabhili bhatemingenenje nnyenje mpanda, bhakapilikananjeje kuti a Yeshu bhapinga pita gwene mpandago, gubhautienje lilobhe, “Mmakulungwa, Bhaulongo gwa a Daudi, nntubhonele shiya!”
Lugwinjili lwa bhandu lula bhakwaakalipilangaga kupinga bhapumulanje. Ikabheje bhanganyabho gubhapundilenje kweya lilobhe, “Mmakulungwa, Bhaulongo gwa a Daudi, nntubhonele shiya!”
A Yeshu gubhajimi, gubhaashemilenje nikwabhuyanga, “Nkupinganga nintendelanje nndi?”
Gubhaajangwilenje, “Mmakulungwa, tunajuga tulole.”
Bhai, a Yeshu gubhaabhonelenje shiya, gubhaakwashiyenje meyo gabhonji, na shangupe gubhalolilenje, nigubhaakagwilenje.
A Yeshu na bhaajiganywa bhabho bhakabhandishilanjeje ku Yelushalemu gubhaikengenenje ku Bhetipage tome na shitumbi sha Misheituni, gubhaatumilenjeje bhaajiganywa bhabho bhabhili,
gubhaalugulilenje, “Nnjendangane kushijiji shili mmujo jenunji, kweneko shimung'imananje mbunda atabhilwe naka mwanagwe. Mwagopolanje nkajiye nabhonji.
Monaga mundu ammuyangaga shoshowe, munnugulilanje, ‘Bhakulungwa bhanakwaapinganga,’ nabhalabho shangupe shibhampanganje.”
Genega gashinkutendeka nkupinga gatimilile gegala galugwilwe na ankulondola bha a Nnungu bhalinkuti,
“Mwaabhalanjilanje bhashilambo ku Shayuni, ‘Munnole, Mpalume jwenu anakwiya! Ashikwitimalika na ashikwela mbunda, Mwana jwa mbunda.’ ”
Bhaajiganywa bhala gubhapitengene, nigubhatendilenje malinga shibhalugulilwenje na a Yeshu.
Gubhanjiye nabhonji mbunda jula naka mwanagwe, gubhatandikenje nngubho yabhonji panani jabhonji na a Yeshu gubhakwelile nitama panani nngubho paka mwana mbunda.
Bhandu bhagumbelenje bhala gubhatandikenje nngubho yabhonji ina mumpanda, na bhandu bhananji gubhatemilenje maagala gubhatandikenje mumpanda.
Bhandu bhabhagwinji bhalinginji mmujo na bhalinginji nnyuma bhala, gubhautiyenje lilobhe bhalinkutinji, “Nnumbililwe Bhaulongo gwa a Daudi! Apegwe mboka jwene akwiya kwa lina lya Bhakulungwa! Bhalumbililwe a Nnungu bhali Kunnungu!”
A Yeshu bhakajinjileje ku Yelushalemu, shilambo showe gushigumbele nnjasha. Bhandunji gubhalinginji nkubhuya, “Jweneju gani?”
Likundi lya bhandunji munkumbi mula gubhashitenje, “Bhenebha a nkulondola bha a Nnungu a Yeshu, kopoka ku Nashaleti shilambo sha Galilaya.”
Bhai, a Yeshu gubhajinjile ku liekalu, gubhaabhinjilenje palanga bhandu bhaushangaga na uma indu ku liekalu, gubhapindikulenye mesha ya bhaatindiganya mmbiya bhala na itengu ya bhaushanga ngunda.
Gubhaalugulilenje, “Ishijandikwa Mmajandiko ga Ukonjelo, ‘Nyumba jangu shijishemwe nyumba ja nyujila nne.’ Ikabheje mmanganya nshikujitendanga lishembo lya bhaapokonyola indu.”
Ashinangalole na bhalemelenje gubhaajendelenje ku liekaluko, nabhalabho a Yeshu gubhaalamiyenje.
Bhai, bhakulungwanji bhaabhishila na bhaajiganya bha Shalia bhakaibhonanjeje ilapo ibhatendile a Yeshu, na bhana bhashoko pubhautiyangaga lilobhe ku liekalu bhalinkutinji, “Bhalumbililwe Bhaulongo gwa a Daudi,” gubhatumbelenje.
Kwa nneyo gubhaalugulilenje, “Bhuli, nkapilikana ibhaabheleketanga?” A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “Elo, ngulipilikana! Bhuli, nkanabhe shomanga Mmajandiko? ‘Kwa kang'wa ya bhana bhashoko na ashinambombe Shibhannumbililanje.’ ”
Bhai, gubhaaleshilenje, gubhajabhwile pa shilambo pala gubhapite ku Bhetania, gubhagonile kweneko.
Lyambape a Yeshu bhalibhuja kwenda ku Yelushalemu, gubhakwete shibhanga.
Gubhagubhweni nkongo gumo gwa tini nnyenje mpanda, gubhaujendele, ikabheje bhangashibhona shindu ikabhe maambape. Bhai, gubhaulugulile nkongo gula, “Unaogoye kabhili iepo pitipiti!” Shangupe nkongo gwa tini gula ukunyalaga.
Bhaajiganywa bhakaubhonanjeje bhashinkulapanga, gubhashitenje, “Kwa nndi agu nkongogu ushinyala shangupe?”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, monaga nkolangaga ngulupai gwangali lipamba, shinkombolanje tenda nngabha ga ntinipe, ikabheje nkali kushilugulila ashi shitumbishi, ‘Tutumbuka ukatumbushile mmashi,’ shiitendeshe.
Na nkolangaga ngulupai, shoshowe shishinnjuganje kwa a Nnungu, shimpegwanje.”
A Yeshu bhakajinjileje ku liekalu bhali nkujiganya, bhakulungwanji bhaabhishila na bhanangulungwa bha bhandunji gubhaajendelenje nikwaabhuya, “Nnatenda genega kwa ukulungwa ukeni? Gani ampele jene amuliji?”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “Na nne ngunakumuyanga, nnyangulangaga, bhai na nne shininnugulilanje ngunatenda genega kwa ukulungwa ukeni.
Bhuli, ubhatisho gwa a Yowana kugwakoposhele kwei? Bhuli, kugwakoposhele kwa a Nnungu eu ku bhandu?” Ikabheje gubhabheketelenje ashaayenenji, Tulugulaga, “Kugwakoposhele kwa a Nnungu,” shibhatubhuye, “Bhai, pakuti mwangakulupalilanga?”
Na tulugulaga, “Kugwakoposhele ku bhandu,” tunakwaajogopanga bhandunji pabha bhowe bhanakundanga kuti a Yowana ankulondola bha a Nnungu.
Bhai, gubhaajangwilenje, “Tukakumumanya!” Nabhalabho a Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje, “Numbe nne ngannugulilanga ngunatenda genega kwa ukulungwa gwashi.”
“Mmanganya nkubhonanga bhuli? Bhandu bhamo bhashinkukola bhana bhabhili. Gubhannugulile jwankulu jula, ‘Mwanangu, lelo ukakamule liengo kunngunda gwa mishabhibhu.’
Nshanda jula gwajangwile, ‘Ngajenda!’ Ikabheje gwaibhushiye, kungai gwapite kamula liengo.
Ainamundu bhala gubhannugulile jwa nnung'una jula nneila peila, jwalakwe akwaajangulaga, ‘Atati shinyende!’ Ikabheje jwangajenda.
Bhuli, bhene bhabhilibha jwei atendile ibhapinga Ainamundu?” Gubhaajangwilenje, “Jwankulu jula.” Bhai, a Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje, “Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, bhakamula koli na bha labhalabha shibhannongolelanje kujinjila Muupalume gwa a Nnungu.”
Pabha a Yowana bhanng'ishilenje na kunnanguyanga mpanda gwa aki mwangaakulupalilanga, ikabheje bhakamula koli na bha labhalabha bhashinkwaakulupalilanga. Nkali nkagabhonanjeje gowego mmanganya mwangaipetanga nikwaakulupalila.
A Yeshu gubhashite, mpilikananje lutango luna. Bhandu bhamo bhashinkulima nngunda gwa mishabhibhu, gubhatimbiliye lubhigo, gubhaolile liiko lya minyila divai, gubhashenjile na nyingo ja tama bhalinda. Kungai gubhaakolishiyenje bhaalima, gubhajabhwile kwenda shilambo sha talika.
Gakaisheje mobha ga maneng'eno, gubhaatumilenje bhatumishi bhabho ku bhaalimanga bhala, nkupinga bhakatolelanje ndalo.
Bhaalimanga bhala gubhaakamwilenje bhatumishi bhala, jumo gubhankomilenje na juna gubhammulegenje na juna gubhankomilenje maganga mpaka gwawile.
Bhandu bhala gubhaatumilenje kabhili bhatumishi bhana, bhabhagwinji punda bhalongolelenje bhala. Bhaalimanga bhala gubhaatendelenje nneila peila malinga bhalongolelenje bhala.
Kumpelo gubhantumile mwanagwabho akuno bhaliganishiya, shibhannjogopanje pabha mwanangu.
Ikabheje bhaalimanga bhala bhakammonanjeje mwanagwabho gubhabheleketenje ashaayenenji, “Jweneju ni apinga lishi, tummulaje tutole ulishi gwakwe!”
Bhai, gubhankamwilenje, gubhampelekenje kunyenje nngunda gwa mishabhibhu gula, gubhammulegenje.
“Lelo, bhayene nngunda gwa mishabhibhu pushibhaishepo, shibhaatendanje bhuli bhaalimangabho?”
Gubhajangwilenje, “Shibhaabhulaganje bhaalimanga bhangali bha mbonenjibho, na nngunda gula shibhaapanganje bhaalimanga bhananji, shibhajiye kwaapanganga ndalo.”
Penepo a Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje, “Bhuli, nkanabheshomanga yenei Mmajandiko? ‘Liganga libhalikanilenje bhaashenga Nnaino lishibha liganga likulu lya pa ndumba. Bhakulungwa bhatendile lyeneli, Na kunngwetu uwe ni lya lapa!’
“Kwa nneyo ngunakummalanjilanga, Upalume gwa a Nnungu upinga shoywa kungwenunji, bhapegwanje bhandunji bha ilambo ina, shibhakombolanje kutenda ibhapinga a Nnungu.”
Na jwene shaagwile lyene ligangalyo, shatemekanje ipande, na jojowe shilinngwile lyene ligangalyo, shakandaganywe.
Bhakulungwanji bhaabhishila na Mapalishayo bhakapilikananjeje ndango ya a Yeshu, gubhamumanyinji kuti bhanakwaabheleketanga.
Kwa nneyo gubhaloleyenje mwakwaakamulila, ikabheje bhatendaga kwaajogopanga bhandunji, pabha bhandunji bhamumanyinji kuti ankulondola bha a Nnungu.
A Yeshu gubhabhelekete nabhonji kabhili kwa lutango bhalinkuti,
“Upalume gwa kunnungu ushilandana naka mpalume jumo antendele mwanagwe kalamu ja ndowa.
Bhai, gubhatumile bhatumishi bhabho bhajendangane kukwaatolanga bhashemilwenje ku ndowa, ikabheje bhashemilwenje bhala bhashinkukananga.
Gubhatumile kabhili bhatumishi bhana, bhalinkuti, ‘Mwaalugulilanje bhashemilwenje bhala, kalamu jangu nnaino tayali, malume gangu ga ng'ombe ya jimbala na matumbwe iinjilwe na kila shindu tayali, nnjiyangane ku ndowa.’
Ikabheje bhangaimukanga, gubhaijabhulilenje, juna ku nngunda gwakwe na juna ku indu yakwe nnyene,
bhananji gubhaakamwilenje bhatumishi bhala nikwatukananga, gubhaabhulegenje.
A mpalume bhala gubhatumbele, gubhatumile manjola kukwaabhulaganga bhaabhulegenje bhatumishi bhabho, na joka moto shilambo shabhonji.
Kungai gubhaalugulilenje bhatumishi bhabho, ‘Kweli, kalamu ja ndowa pujili tayali, ikabheje bhashemilwenje bhala bhangapinjikwanga.
Bhai, nnjendangane mmalekano na bhobhowe bhushimwaimananje mwaashemanje bhaikangane ku ndowa.’
Bhatumishi bhala gubhashoshilenje, gubhapitengene mmipanda, gubhaishe nabhonji bhandu bhowe, bha mmbonenji na bhangalinginji bha mmbonenji. Nyumba jila gujigumbele bhajeninji.
“Ikabheje a mpalume bhakajinjileje kukwaalolanga bhajeninji, gubhammweni mundu jumo jwangawala nngubho ja ndowa.
Bhakulungwa gubhammushiye, ‘Ambwiga, nnjinjile bhuli gwangali wala nngubho ja ndowa?’ Ikabheje jwangajangula, gwaitamile ilili.
Penepo a mpalume bhala gubhaalugulilenje bhatumishi, ‘Muntabhanje makono na makongono nkanjaanje palanga ku lubhindu, kweneko shikubhe shililo na yaga meno.’ ”
A Yeshu gubhamalishiye bhalinkuti, “Bhashemilwenje bhabhagwinji, ikabheje bhaagwilwenje bhashokope.”
Kungai, Mapalishayo gubhajabhulengene, nigubhapengenenje shanabhuli pushibhaatanjiyanje a Yeshu kwa malobhe gabho.
Bhai, gubhaatumilenje bhaajiganywa bhabhonji na bhandunji bha a Elode, gubhaabhushiyenje, “Mmaajiganya, tumumanyi kuti mmwe mmandu bha kulupalika, na nnaajiganya mpanda gwa a Nnungu kwa kulupalika na nkakunnjogopa mundu jojowe, pabha mmwe mwangali luagu.
Bhai, ntulugulile nkubhona bhuli? Alali eu nngabha alali kulipa koli kwa a Kaishali?”
Ikabheje a Yeshu gubhaumanyi ungamanyika gwabhonji, gubhaalugulilenje, “Mmanganya mmagulumba, kwa nndi nnaninganga?
Nnanguyanje mmbiya ja lipila koli.” Gubhaalangwiyenje.
Bhai, a Yeshu gubhaabhushiyenje, “Pishaji na majandikoga gakeni?”
Gubhaajangwilenje, “Ya a Kaishali.” Penepo a Yeshu gubhaalugulilenje, “Bhai, ya a Kaishali mwaapanganje a Kaishali, na ya a Nnungu mwaapanganje a Nnungu.”
Bhakapilikananjeje nneyo gubhalapilenje, gubhajabhulengenenje nikwaaleka.
Lyene lyubhalyo, Mashadukayo bhananji bhaabheleketanga kuti, bhawilenje bhakayukanga, gubhaajendelenje a Yeshu.
Bhai, gubhaabhushiyenje bhalinkutinji, “Mmajiganya, a Musha bhalugwile, mundu alombile awaga gwangali leka bhana, inapinjikwa jwannung'una abhatole bhakongwebho, nkupinga abhakolele bhana akulugwe.
Bhai, panngwetu pano bhashinkupagwanga bhandu shabha. Jwankulu ashinkulomba gwawile gwangali kolela bhana, gwanneshele mpwakwe bhashitenga bhala.
Nibha nneyo peyo kuka mpwakwe jwa bhili, naka jwa tatu, mpaka bhowe shabha.
Bhakawanganjeje bhowebho, bhakongwe bhala nabhalabho gubhawile.
Bhuli, lyubha lishibhayukanje, shibhabhe bhakongwe bhakeni? Pabha bhashinkulombwa na bhowe shabha.”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “Mmanganya nnapuganikanga kwa ligongo lya nngagamanya Majandiko ga Ukonjelo wala mashili ga a Nnungu.
Pabha bhawilenje pushibhayukanje bhakalombanga wala lombwa, shibhabhanganje mbuti ashimalaika kunnungu.
Ikabheje ga yuka bhawilenje, bhuli, nkanabhe shomanga gubhannugulilenje a Nnungu gala? Bhalinkuti,
‘Nne a Nnungu bha a Bhulaimu na bha a Ishaka na bha a Yakobho!’ Bhai, bhenebho nngabha a Nnungu bha bhandu bhawilenje, ikabheje bha bhandu bhakotonji.”
Bhandu bhagumbelenje bhala bhakapilikananjeje nneyo, gubhalapilenje kwa majiganyo gabho.
Mapalishayo bhakapilikananjeje kuti a Yeshu bhashikwaapeyanga Mashadukayo, gubhaimenenje pamo.
Jumo munkumbi gwabhonji, akujimanya Shalia, akwaabhuyaga a Yeshu nkwaalinga,
“Mmaajiganya, amuli jashi jili jikulungwa Nshalia ja a Musha?”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwile, “ ‘Mwaapinje Bhakulungwa a Nnungu bhenu kwa ntima gwenu gowe na mbumu yenu yowe na kwa lunda lwenu lowe’.
Jeneji ni amuli jikulungwa na ja ntai.
Jabhili jilandana na jenejo, ‘Mwaapinje atami ajenu malinga shinkwipinga mmayene’.
Shalia yowe ya a Musha na majiganyo ga ashinkulondola bha a Nnungu inashimilika kwa yene amulii.”
Mapalishayo bhakaimananjeje pamo, a Yeshu gubhaabhushiyenje,
“Mmanganya nkubhonaga bhuli ga a Kilishitu? Bhuli, mwana juka gani?” Gubhaajangwilenje, “Bhaulongo gwa a Daudi.”
A Yeshu gubhaabhalanjilenje, “Bhai, ikomboleka bhuli kwa a Daudi kwa longoywa naka Mbumu jwa Ukonjelo bhanakwaashema a Kilishitu Bhakulungwa? Pabha bhashinkubheleketa,
‘Bhakulungwa bhashinkwaalugulila Bhakulungwa bhangu. “Ntame nkono nnilo gwangu, Mpaka pushinaabhikanje ashaamagongo ajenu pa makongono genu.” ’
Bhai, ibhaga a Daudi bhanakwaashema a Kilishitu ‘Bhakulungwa’ nibha bhuli bha ulongo bhabho?”
Wala jwakwa mundu abhajangwile. Tandubhila penepo jwakwa mundu alinjile kwaabhuya kabhili.
Kungai a Yeshu gubhaabhalanjilenje bhandunji bhagumbelenje na bhaajiganywa bhabho, bhalinkuti.
Bhaajiganya bha Shalia na Mapalishayo bhashipegwanga ukulungwa gwa shitengu sha a Musha.
Kwa nneyo nkamulanje na tenda shoshowe shishibhannugulilanje. Ikabheje nnakaguyanje itendi yabhonji, pabha bhakaatendanga malinga shibhaajiganyanga.
Bhanatabhanga mishigo ja topa nikwaatwikanga bhandunji mmakoyo, ikabheje ashaayenenji bhakapinganga kujangutila nkali kwa lukowe.
Bhanatendanga itendi yabhonji nkupinga bhalolwanje na bhandunji. Bhanawalanga mabhadili gamakulungwa pa shenyi na mmakono gajandikwe Shalia na leupya mbundo ya pai ya nngubho yabhonji.
Bhanaapinganga tama mwiitengu ya mmujo nkalamu na mmashinagogi.
Bhanapinganga kukomaywa kwa jogopekwa kushoko na bhanapinganga shemwa na bhandunji, Bhaajiganya.
Ikabheje mmanganyanji nnashemwanje, Bhaajiganya, pabha bhaajiganya bhenunji bhamope, na mmanganya mmowe malinga bhandu bha lutumbo lumo.
Wala nnanshemanje mundu jojowe, Atati, pa shilambolyo, pabha Ainabhenunji bhamope, bhali kunnungu.
Wala nnashemwanje, Ashikalongolele, pabha kalongolele jwenunji jumope, ni a Kilishitu.
Ali jwankulungwa munkumbi gwenunji anapinjikwa abhe ntumishi jwenunji.
Jojowe akwiikuya apinga nyegaywa, na akwiinyegaya apinga kuywa.
Ole gwenunji bhaajiganya bha Shalia na Mapalishayo, mmagulumba! Pabha nnakwaugalilanga bhandunji nnango gwa Upalume gwa Kunnungu, mwaashayenenji nkajinjilanga, na wala bhapinganga jinjila bhala nkakwaalekanga bhajinjilangane.
Ole gwenunji mmaajiganya bha Shalia na Mapalishayo bhagulumba! Pabha nnapokonyolanga nyumba ya bhashitenga na nnajuganga Nnungu kwa leupya, nkupinga mmonekananje kubhandu kuti mmambonenji, kwa nneyo shinng'ukumulwanje kupunda bhananji.
Ole gwenunji bhaajiganya bha Shalia na Mapalishayo, mmagulumba! Nnaowanga mmashi na pa litaka nkupinga mumpatanje mundu shakagule dini jenunji. Mumpatangaga, nnakuntendanga mwana jwa ku Jeanamu pabhili kupunda mwaashayenenji.
Ole gwenunji ashikalongolele nangalole! Mmanganya nkutinji mundu alumbilaga kwa lina lya liekalu, kwene kulumbilako nngabha shindu, ikabheje alumbilaga kwa shaabhu ili nniekalu, kwene lumbilako kunakuntabha.
Mmanganya ashikalongolele bhangumba! Shei shipundile, shaabhu eu liekalu litenda jene shaabhujo jibhe ja ukonjelo?
Kabhili nnkutinji kuti mundu alumbilaga kwa shitala nngabha shindu, ikabheje alumbilaga kwa mbepei ibhishilwe pa shitala, kwene lumbilako kunakuntabha.
Mmanganya ashinangalole! Shei shipundile, upo ila, eu shitala shitenda mbepeiyo ibhe ya ukonjelo?
Alumbila kwa shitala analumbila kwa shitala, na kwa indu yowe ili pa shitala.
Na alumbila ku liekalu ashilumbila ku liekalu na kwa bhatama nkati bhala.
Na alumbila kunnungu ashilumbila ku shitengu sha Upalume gwa a Nnungu, na bhaatama panani jakwe.
Ole gwenunji bhaajiganya bha Shalia na Mapalishayo, mmagulumba! Nnashoyanga lipungu lya kumi, nkali maamba ga mmboga, bhishali na tindi, akuno nnilekanga indu ya mana ya Shalia malinga, aki na shiya na ngulupai. Genega gumpinjilwenje kugabhika mmitima gwangali kulibhala gana.
Ashikalongolele nangalole! Nnashoyanga libhembe, ikabheje nimila ngamia, nnyama jwankulungwa.
“Ole gwenunji bhaajiganya bha Shalia na Mapalishayo, mmagulumba! Mmanganya nninginji malinga mundu aukanga ikombe na bhakuli kua, ikabheje nkati mugumbele indu impatilenje kwa pokonyola na shojo.
Mmwe a Palishayo nangalole! Nng'ukanje oti shikombe nkati na kua shikukonje.
“Ole gwenunji bhaajiganya bha Shalia na Mapalishayo, mmagulumba! Puninginji mbuti likabhuli lipashilwe shokaa, kwa palanga linabhoneka kukonja, ikabheje nkati kushigumbala maupa ga bhawilenje na ikoko yaigwinji.
Nneyo peyo mmanganya nnabhonekanga na bhandunji mbuti nkwetenje aki, ikabheje nkati nshigumbalanga ugulumba na ungamanyika.
“Ole gwenunji bhaajiganya bha Shalia na Mapalishayo, mmagulumba! Nnashenjelanga makabhuli ga ashinkulondola bha a Nnungu na konjeleya makabhuli ga bhandunji bhakwetenje aki.
Nnikutinji, ‘Monaga uwe tukapali bhukala ja ashinakulu bhetu, tukanakunde kwaabhulaganga ashinkulondola bha a Nnungu!’
Kwa nneyo, nnakong'ondelanga mwaashayenenji kuti mmanganya bha ulongo gwa bhaabhulegenje ashinkulondola bha a Nnungu.
Bhai, mmaliyanje liengo libhatandubhenje bhanyikala bhenunji lila.
Mmanganya nninginji malinga majoka, bhana bha majoka! Shinnjikubhutukanje bhuli ukumu ja ku Jeanamu?
Pabha nnolanje, nne ngunakumpeleshelanga ashinkulondola bha a Nnungu, bhandunji bhakwetenje lunda na bhaajiganya bha Shalia. Bhananji nkupinga kwaabhulaganga na kwaakomelanga munshalabha bhananji, shimwaakomanje ibhoko mmashinagogi genunji na kwaabhinganga shilambo kwa shilambo.
Kwa nneyo kugambwa kowe shikung'ishilanje kwa ligongo lya minyai ja bhandunji bhakwetenje aki jijitishile pa litaka. Elo, tandubhila kubhulagwa kwa a Abheli bhaaliji bhanguja, mpaka kubhulagwa kwa a Shakalia bhanabhabho a Bhalakiya, bhumwaabhulegenje ku liekalu pakati shitala na liekalu.
Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, lwene lubhelekolu lupinga ukumulwa kwa ligongo lya genego.
“Ugwe Yelushalemu, Ugwe Yelushalemu! Ukwaabhulaganga ashinkulondola bha a Nnungu, na kwaakomanga maganga mpaka kuwa bhatumilwenje kunngwako bhala. Palingwa njilinga kwaakundikanyanga ashibhanago, malinga nanunu jwa nnguku shakuti kwiigutamila yana yakwe, ikabheje gwaangapinga.
Bhai nnoje, nyumba jako shijibhe liame na ushubha.
Pabha, nkamonanga kabhili mpaka pushimmeleketanje, ‘Apegwe mboka jwene akwiya kwa lina lya Bhakulungwa.’ ”
A Yeshu gubhakopweshe ku liekalu nigubhaijabhulile, bhaajiganya bhabho gubhaajendelenje nikwaalanguya majumba gatimbilile liekalu.
A Yeshu gubhaabhalanjilenje, “Nnikugabhonanga gene gowega! Kweli ngunakunnugulilanga, lyakwapi liganga nkali limo shililepeshe panani liganga, yowe ipinga bhomolwa.”
A Yeshu bhakatameje pa shitumbi sha Misheituni, bhaajiganywa bhabho gubhaajendelenje shintemela, gubhaabhushiyenje, “Nntulugulile genega pushigakoposhele shakani? Shilangulo shashi shishilanguye kwiya kwenu na mpelo gwa shilambolyo?”
A Yeshu gubhaajangwilenje, “Mwiteiganje mundu anantembanje.
Pabha bhandu bhabhagwinji shibhaikangane bhalinkutinji, ‘Nne a Kilishitu,’ na bhalabhonji shibhaatembanje bhandu bhabhagwinji.
Shimpilikananje ililo ya ngondo na ngani ya ngondo, ikabheje nnajogopanje, pabha genego ganapinjikwa gakoposhele, ikabheje mpelo ukanabhe.
Shilambo shipinga komana na shilambo shina, upalume gumo upinga komana na upalume guna. Shipinga pagwa shibhanga na ungumila kwa ilambo.
Yene yoweyo mbuti kutandubha kwa mboteko ya shitumbo nkupinga kwiigopola.
“Kungai bhandu bhowe shibhantendebhukanje nkupinga mpotekwanje na bhulagwa. Na bhandunji bhangabha Bhayaudi bhapinga kunshimanga kwa ligongo lyangu nne.
Kabhili, bhabhagwinji bhapinga lekanga ngulupai jabhonji na tendebhukana na shimana.
Bhapinga koposhelanga ashinkulondola bha unami bhabhagwinji bhapinga kwaapuganyanga bhandu bhabhagwinji.
Kwa ligongo lya jenjesheka ilebho, kupingana kwa bhandu shukubhujile nnyuma.
Ikabheje shaikakatimilile mpaka kumpelo shatapulwe.
Ngani ja Mmbone ja Upalume gwa a Nnungu jipinga lunguywa pa shilambolyo, kubha ukong'ondelo ku bhandu bhowe, penepo ni pushuishe mpelo gula.”
Ashomajo agamanye malombolelo ga malobhe ga a Yeshu gakwiya gano. Nigubhashite, a Danieli ankulondola bha a Nnungu bhalugwile ga nnjimwa ja nyatiya. Pushinnjibhonanje jijimi pa ukonjelo,
bhalinginji ku Yudea bhabhutushilanje mwiitumbi.
Ali pashitubhili anatulushe pai kutola indu nnyumba jakwe.
Ali kunngunda anabhuje kumui kutola nngubho yakwe.
Ole gwabhonji bhanabhakongwe bhakwetenje ndumbo na bhajonjeyanga gene mobhago.
Nnjuganje kwa a Nnungu nkupinga kubhutuka kwenunji kunabhe mobha ga mmbepo eu Lyubha lya Pumulila.
Pabha gene mobhago shipinga pagwa shilaje shikanabhe koposhela shitandubhile kupanganywa shilambolyo mpaka lelo, wala shikajiya pagwa kabhili.
Monaga gene mobhago a Nnungu bhakanapunguye jakwa mundu jojowe akatapwilwe, ikabheje gapinga punguywa kwa ligongo lya bhandu bhaagwilwenje na a Nnungu.
Bhai, mundu annugulilangaga, a Kilishitu pubhali apano, eu kubhali akula, nnankulupalilanje.
Pabha bhaapinga koposhelanga Bhakilishitu na ashinkulondola bha unami. Bhapinga tendanga ilangulo ya ikulungwa na ya lapa ya kombola nkali kwapuganyanga bhaagwilwenje na a Nnungu.
Mpilikananje, njikunnimbiyanga gakanabhe koposhela genego.
Bhai, bhannugulilangaga, nnolanje, kubhali kuanga, nnajendangane kweneko, eu, nnolanje, mubhali nnyumba, nnakulupalilanje.
Pabha malinga nnjai shijikuti meta nibhoneka kuliunde kowe, pushiijiyebha malinga pushabhoneshe Mwana juka Mundu lyubha lyashaishe.
Malinga, pene puguli ntui, nipugaimana matumbui, kwa nneyo shene shilanguloshi shinalangula kuti ku mpelo gwa shilambolyo kubhandishile.
Shangupe shipitaga shilaje sha gene mobhago, lyubha lipingabha nnubhindu, mwei ukalangaya na ndondwa ipingagwa pai na mashili ga indu ya kunnungu gapinga tenganyika.
Kungai, shilangulo shika Mwana juka Mundu shishibhoneshe kunnungu, penepo makabhila gowe ga pa shilambolyo gapinga kwiigutanjila, shibhammonanje Mwana juka Mundu alikwiiya mmaunde ga kunnungu ali na mashili na ukonjelo gwanngwinji.
Na bhalabho shibhaatumanje ashimalaika bhabho na lipenga lya oneya, bhalabhonji bhapinga kwaalopolanga bhaagwilwenje bhabho kopoka mmbali yowe ya pa shilambolyo.
Bhai kwa nkongo mwiijiganyanye alu lutangolu, shangupe nyambi yakwe puitandubha ipuka, nnakumumanyanga kuti shuku shibhandishile.
Nneyo peyo mmanganya pushinngabhonanje genega, mmumanyanje kuti bhabhandishile.
Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, alu lubhelekolu lukapela gakanabhe koposhela gowego.
Kunnungu na shilambolyo shiipite, ikabheje malobhe gangu gakapita.
Ikabheje, ga lyene lyubhalyo, eu malanga jwakwa mundu akugamanya shigabhe shakani, wala ashimalaika bha kunnungu, wala Mwana, ikabhe Atati jikape.
Pabha malinga shiyaliji mobha ga a Nuu, puipingabha mobha ga kwiya kwakwe Mwana juka Mundu.
Pabha gene mobhago, nduluko jikanabhe tuluka, bhandunji bhatenda lyanganga na kolelwa na lomba na lombwa, mpaka a Nuu pubhajinjile nshapina.
Bhangashimanyanga shipinga koposhela, mpaka pujaishe nduluko, jikwaajolangaga bhowe. Na malinga pushiijiyebha lyubha lya kwiya kwakwe Mwana juka Mundu.
Gene mobhago bhandunji bhabhili shibhabhanganje mungunda, jumo shatolwe na juna shaleshwe.
Bhanabhakongwe bhabhili shibhabhanganje bhaliyaganga, jumo shatolwe na juna shaleshwe.
Bhai, nsheyanje, pabha nkakulimanyanga lyubha lishibhaishe Bhakulungwa bhenunji.
Ikabheje nnimanyanje lyeneli, monaga bhayene nyumba bhakalimanyi lyubha lya kwiya nngwii, bhakasheshiye, ngubhakajileshileje nyumba jabho kujibhwa.
Kwa nneyo na mmanganya nsheyanje, pabha Mwana juka Mundu shaishe malanga gunkakugamanyanga.
A Yeshu gubhapundile kubheleketa bhalinkuti, bhai gani ntumishi akulupalika na akwete lunda, bhakulungwa bhakwe shibhantende abhe jwa nkulungwa ku bhandu bhabho, abhapanganje shalya pa malanga gakwe?
Mbaya jwene ntumishi, bhakulungwa bhakwe pushibhaishe shibhanng'imane alitenda nneyo.
Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, shibhammishe jwene ntumishijo agoye indu yabho yowe.
Ikabheje ntumishi jwangali jwa mmbone aibheleketelaga muntima gwakwe kuti, bhakulungwa bhangu bhanakabha kubhuja,
kungai gwatandwibhe kwaakomanga bhatumishi ajakwe na tandubha lya na papila pamo na bhaakolelwanga,
bhakulungwa bhakwe ntumishijo shibhaishe lyubha lyangaganishiwa na malanga gangamanyika.
Shibhankome kwa kaje na kunkundikanya likundi limo na bhagulumba. Kweneko shikubhe shililo na tauna meno.
Gene mobhago, Upalume gwa Kunnungu upinga landana na bhali likumi limo bhajigelenje taa yabhonji, gubhapitengene kukumposhela nkulomba.
Nng'ano munkumbi gwabhonji pubhalinginji bhangumba na nng'ano bhashinkukolanga lunda.
Bhangumba bhala bhaashinkujigalanga taa yabhonji gwangali mauta ga sheituni ga jenjesheya.
Ikabheje bhakwetenje lunda bhala bhashinkujigalanga mauta nnyupa na taa yabhonji.
Pabha nkulomba ashinkukabha kwiya, bhali bhowe bhala gubhatandwibhenje kugweela na gubhagonilenje.
Ikabheje pakati shilo guipilikanishe njobhela ya kuti, nkulomba anakwiya, nnjendangane nkaposhelanje.
Penepo bhali bhowe bhala gubhajumukenje, gubhakolokweyenje taa yabhonji.
Bhangumba bhala gubhaabhalanjilenje bhakwetenje lunda bhala kuti, ntupanganje mauta gashoko pabha taa yetu inaimika.
Ikabheje bhakwetenje lunda bhala gubhashitenje, gakatujenela tubhowe! Mbaya nnjendangane nkaumanje kugaushwa!
Bhai, bhali bhangumba bhala bhakajabhulanjeje kuuma mauta, nkulomba gwaishe, na bhali bhalinginji tayali bhala gubhajinjilenje nnyumba pamo nakankulomba, na nnango ukuugalwaga.
“Kungai bhali bhananji bhala gubhaikengene nishema, ‘Mmakulungwa, mmakulungwa, ntuugulile!’
Ikabheje bhenebho gubhaajangwilenje, ‘Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, ngakummanyanga mmanganyanji.’ ”
Kungai a Yeshu gubhashite, “Bhai, nsheyanje, pabha nkakulimanyanga lyubha wala malanga.”
“Pabha Upalume gwa Kunnungu ushilandana naka mundu apinjile jabhula mwanja, akwaashemangaga bhatumishi bhakwe nikwaakamuyanga indu yakwe.
Gubhampele kila mundu malinga shibhammweni kombola kwakwe, jumo mmbiya nng'ano na juna mmbiya ibhili na juna mmbiya jimo, kungai gubhajabhwile.
Shangupe a apegwile mmbiya ng'ano jula gwatendile upindi, gwapatile mmbiya ina nng'ano.
Nneyo peyo na jwene apegwile mmbiya ibhili gwapatile mmbiya ina ibhili.
Ikabheje apegwile mmbiya jimo jula gwapite olela pai mmbiya ja bhakulungwa bhakwe jila.
“Gakapiteje mobha gamagwinji, bhakulungwa bha bhatumishi bhala gubhabhujile, gubhatandwibhe pita bhalanganya mmbiya ibhakamwiye na ibhapatilenje muupindi.
Ntumishi apegwilwe mmbiya nng'ano gwaishe ali ajigele mmbiya nng'ano ina, akwaalugulilaga, ‘Mmakulungwa, mwashinkumba mmbiya nng'ano, nnole mmbiya nng'ano ina imbatile.’
Bhakulungwa bhakwe gubhannugulile, ‘Sha mmbone, ntumishi nnguja na jwaakulupalika. Ushikulupalika kwa indu ya ishoko, shinikupe gamakulungwa. Jiya uangalale pamo na nne.’
“Ntumishi juna apegwilwe mmbiya ibhili gwaishe, gwashoshiye mmbiya ibhili ina yapatile gwashite, ‘Mmakulungwa, mwashinkumba mmbiya ibhili bhai ntole na mmbiya ina ibhili imbatile.’
Bhakulungwa bhakwe gubhannugulile, ‘Sha mmbone, ntumishi nnguja na jwaakulupalika. Ushikulupalika kwa indu ya ishoko, shinikupe ya ikulungwa. Jiya uangale pamo na nne.’
“Kungai gwaishe apegwilwe mmbiya jimo jula, gwashite, ‘Mmakulungwa, nimmanyi mmwe mmanonopa ntima, nnauna munkapandileje na kulopola munkamishiyeje mmbeju.
Nashinkujogopa, gung'ishiye mmbiya jenu pai. Bhai, nntole mmbiya jenu.’
“Bhakulungwa bhakwe gubhannugulile, ‘Ugwe ntumishi jwangali jwa mmbone na nkata! Gwamumanyi kuti ngunauna mungapandileje na ngunalopola mungamishiyeje.
Bhai, gwashinkupinjikwa kujibhika mmbiya jangu kubhenki na nne pushimujepo ngatolile mmbiya jangu na pwaida!
Bhai, mumpokonyolanje mbiyajo nkampanganje akwete mmbiya likumi limo jula.
Pabha, akwete shindu apinga pegwa na jenjeshewa. Ikabheje jwangali shindu jula, nkali shakwete shila shapokonyolwe.
Na gaka ntumishi jwangali pwaida jula, munnjaanje palanga kulubhindu! Kweneko kupingabha shililo na tauna meno.’ ”
Pushaishe Mwana juka Mundu mu ukonjelo gwakwe na ashimalaika bhakwe, penepo shatame pa shitengu shakwe sha upalume.
Bhandu bha ilambo yowe shibhaimananje mmujo jabho na bhalabho bhapinga agulanya bhandu mbuti nshunga shakuti agulanya ngondolo na mmbui.
Shibhaibhishe ngondolo nkono nnilo na mmbui kunkono nshinda.
Kungai a Mpalume shibhaalugulilanje bhalinginji kunkono nnilo bhala, “Nnjiyangane mmanganya mpegwilenje mboka na Atati, mposhelanje upalume gummishilwenje tandubhila kupanganywa kwa shilambolyo.
Pabha nashinkukola shibhanga gumbelenje shalya, nashinkukola nnjota gumbelenje mashi, nashinkubha nannjeni gummboshelenje.
Punaliji na uukunu gummbelenje nngubho, punaliji nannwele gunng'ikenje kunnola na ngatabhweje gunng'owelenje.”
Penepo, bhandunji bhakwetenje aki bhala shibhaajangulanje bhakulungwa, “Mmakulungwa, shakani putwammweni nni na shibhanga nikumpa shalya, eu nni na nnjota nikumpa mashi?
Shakani putwammweni nni mmajeni nikumposhela, eu nni na uukunu nikumpa nngubho nng'wale?
Shakani putwammweni nni mmalwele eu ntabhilwe gutuishe kukunng'owela?”
A mpalume shibhaajangulanje, “Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, shindu shoshowe shimuntendelenje jumo jwa ashaapwanga bhanyegalangabha, nshinkundendelanga nne.”
Kungai shibhaabhalanjilanje bhalinginji ku nkono nshinda gwabho bhala, “Nnyabhulilanje apano mmaaloshwa! Nnjendangane ku moto gwa pitipiti gwaalashiwe Lishetani na ashimalaika bhakwe.
Pabha nashinkukola shibhanga mwangambanganga shalya, nashinkukola nnjota mwangambanganga mashi ga ng'wa.
Punaliji nannjeni mwangamboshelanga, na punaliji na uukunu mwangambanganga nngubho, punaliji nannwele na punatabhilwe mwangang'owelanga.”
Penepo na bhalabhonji shibhaajangulanje, “Mmakulungwa shakani putwammweni nni na shibhanga eu nnjota, nni mmajeni eu nni na uukunu, eu mmalwele eu ntabhilwe twangannjangutila?”
Na bhalabho shibhaajangulanje, “Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, kila punkanilenje kwaatendelanga ashaapwanga bhanyegalangabha, nshinkukananga kundendela nne.”
Bhai, bhanganyabho shibhajendangane ku mboteko ya pitipiti, ikabhe bhakwetenje aki bhala, shibhajendangane ku gumi gwa pitipiti.
A Yeshu bhakamaliyeje bheleketa gowego, gubhaabhalanjilenje bhaajiganywa bhabho,
“Mmumanyinji gapitaga mobha gabhili shipinga pagwa shikukuu sha Pashaka na Mwana juka Mundu apinga tendebhukwa shaakomelwe munshalabha.”
Gene mobhago bhakulungwanji bhaabhishila na bhanangulungwa bha bhandunji gubhaimenenje pamo nnyumba ja a Kayapa, bhaaliji Bhakulungwa Bhabhishila.
Gubhabheleketenje shibhatendanje bhuli, nkupinga bhaakamulanje a Yeshu kwa unami bhaabhulaganje.
Ikabheje gubhashitenje lyenelyo linatendeshe mobha ga shikukuu, jinakoposhela nnjasha ku bhandu.
A Yeshu pubhaliji ku Bhetania kunngwabho a Shimoni bhaakwete mangundula bhukala,
bhakongwe bhamo bhaakwete shupa sha alabhashita sha mauta ga nunjila ga mmbiya yaigwinji, gubhaaishile pubhaalyaga shalya pala, gubhaajitile mauta gala muntwe.
Bhaajiganywa bhabho bhakabhonanjeje genego guyaashimilenje, gubhashitenje, “Kwa nndi jonanganya nnei?
Pabha aga mautaga gakaushiwe kwa mmbiya yaigwinji na elayo nipegwa bhalaganga.”
A Yeshu gubhaimanyi ng'aniyo yabhonji, gubhaabhalanjilenje, “Pakuti nnakwaabhuyanga bhakongwebha? Pabha bhenebha bhashindendela shindu sha mmbone.
Bhalaganga nni nabhonji mobha gowe, ikabheje nne ngabha na mmanganya mobha gowe.
Abha bhakongwebha bhashinyitila mauta nkupinga mika tayali kwa mashiko gangu.
Kweli ngunakummalanjilanga, kila pushijilunguywe Ngani ja Mboneji pa shilambolyo, shene shibhatendile bhakongweshi, shipinga lunguywa nkwaakumbushila.”
Kungai, a Yuda Ishikaliote, jumo munkumbi gwa likumi limo na bhabhili bhala, gubhaajendelenje bhakulungwanji bhaabhishila,
gubhashite, “Shimmbanganje nndi ninkamuyangaga a Yeshu?” Gubhaabhalanganishiyenje mmbiya makumi gatatu.
Tandubhila penepo a Yuda bhatendaga loleya shanabhuli shibhaatendebhushe a Yeshu.
Lyubha lya tandubha shikukuu sha mikate jangatagwa ngedule, bhaajiganywa bhabho gubhaajendelenje a Yeshu nikwaabhuya, “Kwei kunkupinga tukakolokoye shalya sha Pashaka?”
